overview: With no career expectations, a temperamental young woman gave in to a job as a maid in a hotel. Makes the beds, replaces the towels, replaces the soaps. One day she discovers a suitcase left behind by a whimsical French tourist, inside which she finds a lime green canary, a natural yogurt and a five hundred euro envelope.

title: Flush
overview: Tom, a conservative cisgender jock encounters Sarah, a non-binary person, in a university men’s toilets, but when he intends to leave, they have been accidentally locked in and are stuck together until morning.

title: I Will Never Shoot Again
overview: I Will Never Shoot Again
tagline: At Salvador, Bahia, a man that drinks meets again a woman that smokes.

title: Dinosauritis
overview: Four characters get stuck in a boarding house after the spread of a contagious disease.
tagline: THEY ARE BACK, AND MAY BE RIGHT INSIDE YOUR HOUSE.

title: For Now We're Fine
overview: A man takes romantic interests to the same spot, creates hopes and dreams on them, but he always seems to end their relationship before things get too deep.

title: As Horas de Ana
overview: Ana doesn't feel at home anymore

title: Black Heart
overview: A couple looks to mend their relationship and build a new home in the Azores.

title: Baderna
overview: Baderna is a city in a countryside region of Brazil. Founded in 1871, it was built by black enslaved people and today it remains emancipated from the Brazilian state. With its mundane conflicts and its historical resistance, the city also maintains an intense relationship with nature. The movie narrates the day when Baderna receives 'Obaluaê', the 'Orixá' lord of the Earth, in a search for the cure of the 21st century.

title: Amor Fluido
overview: The main character is named Hugo, who represents Zaady as a child. He lost his father at the age of 9, and his mother ended up in a rehab clinic, causing him to move in with his grandparents. An invitation to spend the school vacations with a couple of family friends may have traced his entire history and may be the root of his personal conflicts. From this, the film tells the trajectory of a young man with a difficult and troubled personality who, upon arriving in Aracaju, starts dating Scarlet, a determined and engaging woman, but hides from her that he has another relationship with Duda, a drag queen who works in a nightclub in town.

Bernardo owns a furniture industry. In his sixties, he lives alone. After his father's death, he has to count to ten everynight to fall asleep. Time goes by, and it seems like he just can't fall asleep.

title: Freezing Night in Castelo Branco
overview: Sofia and Marco, a young couple, is visiting Castelo Branco at night. They start a conversation with an homeless who-s playing guitar on the street. While the conversation takes place Sofia starts suspecting that he is the father she never knew...

original_title: A Ponte Quebrada do Pôr do Sol
title: The Broken Bridge of Sunset
overview: Ian and Lucas are childhood friends who discover that love can be changeable and that you can't go back when the feeling is ingrained.
tagline: Can't go back.

title: First Day of Summer
overview: On the first day of Gabriel's summer vacation, he watches his first crush by the poolside while dealing with two unwanted kids and the curiosity of how it feels like to be kissed for the first time.
tagline: The first day of summer is coming.

title: Casa Na Comporta
overview: Casa Na Comporta is one of four films commissioned to different directors for the Portuguese architecture national exhibition at the Venice Biennale.

title: Second Half
overview: After theirs father's death, Carl and Ana decide to go to Germany to rescue his unknown story. There, not only will they discover familiar tracks, they will confront and recognize themselves, to move forward in their lives.

title: Don't Call Me That
overview: Daniela is about to have her long-awaited gender reassignment surgery, and she can't think about anything else. Roberto, her lover, tries to dissuade her from doing it, revealing an unsettling relationship that awakes past traumas.

title: Dead Model, Live Model
overview: Manuela, a trans woman, an artist, who, when attending a live model workshop, awakens to her own beauty and power, even though she has to face everyday difficulties, which require courage and determination.

title: Purple Dictatorship
overview: Yeda, the green-faced woman, sells homemade bread to support the house where she lives with her sick husband. Through the context of green-faced people, we know the reality of those who live on the fringes of a purple-faced society.

original_title: Antes Que o Céu nos Consuma
title: Antes Que o Céu nos Consuma
Wolfpack
overview: Women who run with each other.  Watch here: https://vimeo.com/369297512

title: Little Pieces
overview: Isa tries the entrance exam for the second time, the economic crisis hits her family and her body does not respond as it should.
tagline: LITTLE CHOICES, BIG CONSEQUENCES

title: Firar
overview: The story of a teacher and painter who, after his mother's death, camouflaged himself in solitude, distancing himself from all around him. When looking for landscapes that complete your drawing, he finds in a young refugee, his inspiration.
tagline: A story about sadness, depression, longing and grief. But also about unconditional Love...

title: Cocoon
overview: Mario and his father live isolated in a small place in Brazi's countryside.

title: Their Happiness
overview: Two girls run away from the police after the Women's March. In the midst of violence, they find a way to live their desire.

original_title: Sábado não é dia de ir embora
title: Saturday
overview: Directly impacted by the 2017 UERJ strike, Rita, a Visual Arts student from Pernambuco, is torn between farewells from the ties she created in Rio and the fixation of rescuing her last academic-artistic work that is locked in a university room.

title: Tipóia
overview: At home for a problem in his arm, Paulo watches from couch the transformations in Brazilian society in 2016 without reaction power.

title: Síndrome de Stendhal
overview: A girl after being exposed to a work of art, enters a psychotic hallucination caused by Stendhal syndrome.

title: O Desvio
overview: Two erratic journeys whose only relation is all that happens at the same time and in a limited radius. It is a film that refuses to judge, trying to tell two stories while refusing to be subjected to analogies between them.

title: The River
overview: Joana and Samuel's relationship has a specif routine.

title: Birthday
overview: On a  winter afternoon. 20 year Henrique tries to call his sister without success. A boy in yellow has difficulties giving a birthday present to Henrique. Between past and present situations, Henrique searches for attention where it doesn't exist.
tagline: short

title: Looping
overview: The screams of despair in an amusement park foreshadow the scandal that love is. Looping, by Maick Hannder, uses photographs to enact the conflict of gazes between the one who loves and the one who is loved. Are we also obsessed by this character who’s raised by affection to the status of entity?

title: Peixe
overview: Marina is a young woman in Belo Horizonte who makes deliveries on her bike.

original_title: As janelas que encontramos no caminho
title: As janelas que encontramos no caminho
Rosário
overview: Rosario lives on the hill and works at a neighborhood fair. Since she suffered a major loss, she has been in the habit of listening to the police program every morning and praying for the victims, until one day she becomes a character in one of these stories.

title: Maria
overview: When his wife dies during child-birth, Arsénio turns to a foul ritual with hopes of having the daughter he never got to know.

original_title: Uma Paciência Selvagem Me Trouxe Até Aqui
title: A Wild Patience Has Taken Me Here
overview: Vange, a lonely biker, is enchanted by the relationship and freedom of four girls, with whom she spends a weekend where exchanges about lesbian experiences and culture are present, accompanied by a mutual affection that gradually establishes itself.

title: Ciao Roma
overview: Julia and Elis celebrate their life long friendship with a trip to Rome. There, Julia meets her italian grandparents for the first time and falls in love with a man.

title: Bad Honey
overview: At the beginning of the 20th century, a German household attempts to stay isolated from their new surroundings, in the south of Brazil. Their fear, however, sets the way for conflict.

original_title: O anúncio me falou outra vez
title: The Advertisement Told Me Once Again
overview: Accompany Seu Madruga's inner trip of resolve as he finds peace in his last breath.

title: Os Sonâmbulos
overview: In an automated world, an old factory feeds on its own work force.

title: The Girl from Berlin
overview: A young woman returns to Lisbon to meet her ex-boyfriend after a stay in Berlin. While trying to resettle the old relationship, she gradually realizes that the emotional and physical dependance is the only element that bonds them.

title: Behave, Kid
overview: In a rural town, the relationship between teacher and student goes beyond the classroom and transforms their lives.
tagline: A teacher, a student, passion and prejudice.

title: Eu Sinto Muito
overview: A filmmaker is producing a documentary on personality disorders. He follows three people with some crisis or emotional instability, whom all have difficulties on maintaining personal relationships.

title: Dom Fradique
overview: A path for tourists on their way to the Castle of São Jorge, the Pátio Dom Fradique was once a popular courtyard where around sixty families used to live.Today, ruins of their houses are the unique remains.There, the erased memories of the old city history and the frenzy of the new Lisbon give way to a contemporary urban tale.

title: Road of Nothing
overview: Life is as unchanging as ever in the village: the sun sets between memories. The arrival of a young outsider changes everything. The old are offered a new gift and they accept it. The dreams awaken an old song which pulses through the village. 'With Fate driving the cart of everything along the road of nothing.'

title: O Espelho Lento
overview: The story of Carla and Marta, the daughter who is seriously ill. In Barcelona, Carla discovers a special mirror, which is an open door to the past: it keeps the reflection for several years instead of returning it immediately.  Carla offers her daughter the mirror and it will change their lives forever.

title: Mais
overview: Somewhere in the city of Porto, two lower class kids fall in love and dream of a different life.

title: Look No Further
overview: Elsie wakes Löic from a hidden grave in the forest. He does not remember anything, just what they are: vampires. With his memory slowly returning, Elsie fears that the love she feels for Loïc may not be enough to keep him by her side.

title: The Last Romantics
overview: Two young men share different points of view of the same sexual encounter in a public space.

title: Familiar Environment
overview: There are many ways to overcome the losses and drop-outs of childhood. Three boys reinvent the concept of family to face the traumas of their lives.

title: Inglory
overview: Raimundo is an amateur wrestler who finds himself unemployed and without a fixed income when faced with a proposal to give up the fight, entering a dilemma that divides him between the glory of a possible career or the love of his son.

title: Sila
overview: The destiny of a group of Cangaceiro bandits after the death of their captain Virgulino Ferreira da Silva, better known as Lampião.

title: Cadence
overview: Monica, after a restless night, meets a strange man, in a place she does not recognize. He questions her about past events that she doesn't quite remember.

title: Soil
overview: The mountain burns in the August heat. A firefighter falls, swallowed by the ground. The broken body survives as it can. Outside, the night descends.

title: Mãe
overview: Madalena is Sônia's mother, who is Julia's mother, who is Camila's mother. A family of women so different, yet trapped by events and tragedies so interconnected. Closely related, distant due to fatality. A story where reality invades fiction.

title: The Age of Anxiety
overview: Love, fear and anxiety. A couple spends their last night together, in Lisbon, before one of them leaves for another country. A romantic night gives way to unspoken tensions in their life's turbulent present and the world's uncertain future.

title: Son of Ox
overview: João is a lonely boy living in the outback. No friends, no mother, and no bond with his father, he finds a chance to overcome his fears and a possibility to fit in when a small circus arrives in town.

production_companies.name: Fundação Cultural do Estado da Bahia

title: Leap.
overview: After sinking, Carlos turns up at the coast along with his colleagues. In a struggle for life already lost, Carlos tries to seek salvation by accepting death leaving his family behind.

title: Drugs You Should Try
overview: Miguel, a lonely boy, wanders around in his daily routine, while trying to understand the moments of his life spent with a girl, with whom he is obsessed. These peculiar occasions begin to torment him, but he does not seek an explanation for them.

title: My Castle My Home
overview: Guilherme is a boy with 13 years old that plays tennis, he has to see and deal with his nightmares and his own fears.

title: Apathy
overview: Rafael is a 20 year old who lives in the past, remembering it through old recordings.

title: Dynamite Girl
overview: Thiago is in love with a girl who appears every night in his dreams. Obsessed with the desire to meet her, the boy can no longer sleep.

title: Medo de Sangue
overview: The sound of something falling, broken glass, car alarm triggered. She runs down the stairs of the building and faces the scene. With desperation, she moves away, leaving in the background the bloody body of a man fallen into a wrecked car. In a blood bank, she fearfully awaits for the time to donate. He appears in front of her. A ghost? A memory? The moment of the blood donation will reveal the pain and the challenges of the couple`s separation.

title: Dark
overview: An inactive swim coach follows an enigmatic blind man who will help her overcome a past that haunts her and prevents her from practicing her profession.

title: Duda
overview: It's summer and Duda wants to go to the beach.

title: Doce de Coco
overview: Diana's family produces coconut sweets. João gathers the coconut and Diana and Lucia make the sweets. Zacarias sells product in the city. One day, Diana goes to the river with her mother and her aunt Maria.

title: Take Wing
overview: Ants fly in downtown Fortaleza on a dawn lost in time.

original_title: Onde a Cidade é Comida, Saudade é Fome
title: Onde a Cidade é Comida, Saudade é Fome
Marias da Sé
overview: A typical day in Porto's Cathedral, between tourists and the local community. A peculiar group of women grabs our attention...

title: Desta Água...
overview: We only understand some behaviour when we duplicate them involuntarily.

title: Entre Macacos e Anjos
overview: Max, controversial and cult filmmaker, go into crisis  after knowing the diagnosis about your photophobia,  that points to possible blindness.  Trans-  developed, undertakes a complete overhaul of  their artistic, philosophical and affective postures,  projecting them on the film he makes.

title: A Melhor Versão de Mim
overview: Lucas struggles to be adopted and spends his days being teased by the other children.  His only friend is music, but that changes when he meets Marina, a girl who claims to come from another planet.

title: Você me ama?
overview: Cecília is a woman whose previous relationships have all failed. She believes she's now living an one-way love: even with all her effort, she doesn't get anything back. In the day of their anniversary, she wonders: are these feelings real or just figments of her imagination?

title: Family Dinner
overview: Everything seems to be normal in this family dinner. However, what looks like harmony, soon becomes a stressful situation, when secrets are revealed.

title: Terra Nova
overview: Manaus, April 2020. Karoline is a theater actress who decides to go to a Caixa branch to request her emergency assistance. She is accompanied by her sister who is going to try to get her job back.

title: Albertina
overview: At the beginning of the 20th century, in the interior of the municipality of Imaruí, in the state of Santa Catarina, a Christian soul was born that persists in believing in human goodness, despite the iniquities of this world. She is Albertina, the daughter of colonists of Catholic German descent. Even at an early age, she finds serenity and spiritual comfort in faith. His life is a response and undeniable proposal to the misfortunes and challenges of society at all times. His charisma and testimony attract the best in human beings, but also the worst that can be.

title: Pas de Quoi
overview: A ferryboat. A meeting between two souls. Hurdles and shadows keep being overcome until the end. Bodies always striving to breathe along the way.

title: Vanitas
overview: "Vanity of vanities, everything is vanity" says the bible. The word flows from the tongue naming the pleasure of earthly life and judging it as beautiful, but shallow and useless; vanity is a deadly sin. A female sin. The man painted the woman, put a mirror in his hands and called it vanity. The woman in representation admires herself, but the one who really admires her body is the artist. Whose vanity? In VANITAS, we re-divide the woman in our bodies, showing the depth of what is palpable. If the Father's temple hides after death, clean and perfect, we reject them. We welcome Mother Nature in us, life-death in a perpetual sacred cycle, also honoring her dark face. You may wish to reach heaven, but it is on earth that your knees fall.

production_companies.name: Círculo de Iniciação Teatral da Academia de Coimbra (CITAC)

tagline: Vanitas vanitatum omnia vanitas

title: almost there
overview: Just another normal day, like any other in the last few years.

title: Midnights
overview: Jair’s courtship is over.

title: Ataléia Street
overview: In 2011, during a blackout in an outskirt neighborhood’s street, a family  – surrounded by candles that light conversations and thoughts  –  awaits the return of electricity. Now, ten years later, the light tries to impose its place towards the shadows of memory.

title: FORTEpiano
overview: A person shaken by the catastrophes of the world cannot let go of their chaotic thoughts until they find a bond that was once lost.
tagline: See the world as it is.

title: Kicks
overview: Sandra is pregnant and wants a girl. Her husband Marcos wants a soccer player.

original_title: Luz, Câmera, 50 Anos: Dalva e Herivelto, Uma Canção de Amor - O Filme
title: Luz, Câmera, 50 Anos: Dalva e Herivelto, Uma Canção de Amor - O Filme
overview: The singer Dalva de Oliveira and the composer Herivelto Martins lived intensely on the stage and in life. The 13 years of marriage and the disagreements, which gained emphasis with the separation, contributed to an important artistic and cultural production.

title: Beasts
overview: The story of Lucas, a 13 year-old kid who swears vengeance to the man that abuses his mother in exchange for a miserable life.

title: Two
overview: Bernardo and Luix seek an affective approach during the period of social detachment. In the midst of chaos, they try to discover other ways of loving.

title: Attire
overview: After going through a hiring process for a company based on São Paulo, Daniel, that came from another city, now needs to deliver them some important documents. However, he is blocked from the entrance because he is wearing shorts.

title: Nico
overview: Isolated in an old and gloomy house, Tomaz and Martin spend their days in a tedious routine. One morning, Martin finds a young girl dead in the bathroom.

title: 25 Anos Sem Asfalto
overview: Rose is committed to ensure Pedro a better future than a life confined between the dirty streets of the neighborhood and the asphalt of the city, when an unexpected event will make her connect with her son's daily adventures.

title: The Last Touches
overview: Luísa decides to go after her father that she never met in order to understand why he abandoned her.
tagline: IT IS BETTER THAT SOME THINGS STAY IN THE PAST

original_title: Renúncia - Suas Escolhas Definem Seu Futuro
title: Renúncia - Suas Escolhas Definem Seu Futuro
Kombi
overview: Joana receives her grandfather’s ashes. At home, she finds his voyage diary that belonged to her grandfather and decides to recreate that journey. On the road, she meets Rui, who helps to find the truth about her past.
tagline: An adventure. Opportunities come when you least expect them. Joana will grab them, overcoming all the obstacles that life's journey imposes on her.

original_title: Ninguém Sai de Casa à Toa
title: Ninguém Sai de Casa à Toa
Feeling Blue
overview: 'Feeling Blue' is a visual representation of a morning soaked by depression. It is also the struggle and the poetic beauty of life shown through a dark point of view.

title: A Present Light
overview: On a rainy night, a sad man leaves his home to deliver a letter to someone who recently left him. At a corner, he meets a woman who warns him about the slippery road. This is how I met Diana. Suffering from a heartbreak, Gonçalo falls from his motorbike.

title: Before Summer Ends
overview: Small great events of a family summer in the countryside.

title: Cordão
overview: A boy falls in love with the ideology of an underground political cult. To the sound of 'Cordão' by Chico Buarque.

title: While I Sing
overview: A boy finds himself trapped in an empty space and tries, in vain, to communicate with the world around him. But his only form of communication is his flute, that seems to be unheard by anyone.  Life passes through him in the midst of sadness and loneliness, where the empty space mirrors the feelings of a confused and angry being for not understanding the reason why he lost his freedom to live.

title: Tuesday Overnight
overview: At dawn, a boy, a city and unexpected encounters.

title: In Carnare
overview: Forced to confront each other and consumed by deep-seated feelings, two people struggle to figure out what should stay alive: the chaotic present or the unknown future. Based on the short story 'Hoje Quero Partir Sem Você', written by Bianca Souza.

original_title: No Dia em que Lembrei da Viagem a Bicuda
title: The day I Remembered the Trip to Bicuda
overview: I always left that memory buried deep in my mind. Until one day she came back as a movie.

title: Uma Vida Toda Empatada
overview: An adaptation of the short story with the same name by Portuguese writer Mário de Carvalho.

title: White Mangrove
overview: An immersive look at the life of Maíra, a woman who lives in a small seaside town where she works as a masseuse in a resort. She pends her days in a routine without great enthusiasm and prospects, dividing herself between a bland job, a distant husband and long walks around the neighborhood. One afternoon, she is faced with an event that reverberates inside Maíra as an impulse to review her life as a whole.

title: Novo Mundo
overview: A paradise for the eyes, the phrase defines the character's destination place, A Terra Sem Males.  After walking through forests and ruins, she realizes that that territory was built on the blood of many peoples.  This knowledge could paralyze her, create fear, but they inspire acts of courage.

original_title: Um cavalo olhou pro céu com esperanças de fuga
title: A horse looked at the sky with hope of escape
overview: For 19 minutes, as we watch a horse reflecting on fatherhood, space rockets, time and interpersonal relationships, his trail of thoughts hovers in the air in the form of ghostly colors.
tagline: THERE IS NO ESCAPE, OR PERMANENCE.

original_title: Preces Precipitadas de um Lugar Sagrado Que Não Existe Mais
title: Preces Precipitadas de um Lugar Sagrado Que Não Existe Mais
overview: Dawn, returning home after a reggae party, Breno ends up in a place between the present, the past and the future

title: De Costas Pro Rio
overview: After the contact of a spirit from the forest, Pietro returns to Manaus to save her.  He must prevent the city from being destroyed by a Big Snake that sleeps in the region's underground.

title: August Sky
overview: In a world on fire, a seven-month-old pregnant nurse deals with growing anxiety while gradually finding herself attracted to a member of the Pentecostal church and her community.

title: Rosa Tirana
overview: In a sun-drenched land, during the greatest drought that the Northeastern hinterland has ever lived, The girl Rosa dives on a long journey through the arid and fantastical caatinga, in search of an encounter with our lady Immaculate, the queen of the hinterland.  With an insightful tone, the plot is enveloped by an amalgamation of factors that, in the dryness of the portrayed landscape, becomes fertilizer for the understanding of human drama, from the perspective of the little protagonist.

title: The Siege
overview: Ana is surrounded.  In the apartment below, the ghosts of the past and on the terrace, the ghosts of the future.

title: Eu. Empresa
overview: A self-employed worker faces financial and emotional problems. Without any decent opportunities, he creates a channel on YouTube as an attempt to monetize on his own failures while takes precarious jobs in huge corporations.

title: Voltei!
overview: Brazil, 2030. The sisters Alayr and Sabrina are hearing on the cell radio the judgment that could change the course of a country "without energy". They are surprised by Fátima, the sister who returns from the dead to fraternize on this historic night.

title: A Morte do Super-Homem
overview: Luís Carlos is back from a six-week trip to Boston, where he was doing research on Superman for his master’s thesis. He considers Superman to be one of the best heroes of all time – if not the best. When he arrives in Lisbon and discovers that Superman has died, despair takes over his life.

title: Toda Cidade Anda Esquecida
overview: During the carnival in Rio, the depressed César meets Silva, a man in full vigor of life and passionate about carnival.

title: Stanley
overview: Two boys, one girl, one night in the Northeast of Brazil. A morning of passion and secrets revealed.

title: All That You Could Be
overview: The story of Elio, a young heir to his father's company, with whom he has a strained relationship, that receives his first big task in the business: to pay his father's debts to a loan shark. This night a revealed secret will change the lives of these three men in violent ways.

title: O Rapaz do Tambor
overview: Jaime, an introverted young man, suffers from the humiliations his schoolmates inflict on him. The father, director of the school, distant and of absolute power, treats him with indifference. With the support of his mother, Jaime finds in a painting, a boy with a drum in front of the troops in battle, the inspiration and the example of courage that will transform him into an unlikely hero in the fight against oppression.

title: Mutter
overview: The short film began from an adaptation of the comic book "The Last Man" from the collection Y. It takes place in a near future, in the world where human clones and human fight for power domination. Dr. Teresa is about to give birth a child. She is accompanied by her assistant. Both look for Dr. Pedro for assistance. He refuses at first.

title: The Act
overview: With the world in suspension Dante meets Ava, a woman who offers him her affection to facilitate his crossing over to the other side.

title: From Another Seasons
overview: After a terrible loss, Nívea embarks on a trip to the south of Minas with her friends: Serena and Iara. Together they reflect on everything that makes them who they are.

title: Bring me a Dream
overview: A boy finds himself lonely and seeks ways to end this feeling.
tagline: Going nowhere

title: NORMAL
overview: An young man faces his own solitude after losing his family on a tragedy.
tagline: Grief is worse than death

original_title: A Balada de João e Sofia
title: A Balada de João e Sofia
Turvo
overview: The film follows João, a 20-year-old boy who lives in the small town of Turvo, on the weekend before he receives his college application results. If he gets accepted, he will have to leave his city, his family, his friends and his comfort zone.
tagline: Turvo

title: Voyage to Morocco
overview: "Voyage to Morocco" is the second film of a series made from found footage on silent super 8. Combining images shot in Morocco in the 60's, texts by the writer Paul Bowles, Moroccan traditional music and a minute sound design, a narrator invents a memory for those images, rewrites its sense. A film essay about the experience of traveling, in geographical, imaginary and metaphysical sense. To travel is a pretext to speak about other cultures and look for diversity, but traveling to visit a friend may also be a farewell.

title: New World
overview: Conceição and Presto, an interracial couple, ask Presto's brother for his signature as a guarantor of the financial request supposed to assure them an apartment in Leblon, the whitest neighborhood in Rio de Janeiro. The process proves to be much harder than they had imagined.

title: Despedida
overview: When 11-year-old Ana travels to her grandmother’s funeral in a town in the state of Rio Grande do Sul, strange things begin to happen. Next to her family’s house lies a forest, and within it a magical world inhabited by ghosts, wolves, and all sorts of fantastic beings. In the course of a carnival holiday, a family mystery linking her grandmother and her mother must be unraveled through intuition and courage. Only then will the wounds of the past be healed to re-enchant the present.

title: Short Journeys into the Night
overview: Six musicians from São Paulo, Brazil, dream of being discovered at night, alternating days in precarious services and early mornings, seeking a path in the world of music

title: A Lei
overview: Soldiers from the Military Police stand at the counter of a decadent diner, where they can eat greasy food without paying the bill. When they discuss their violent job in one of the biggest cities in the world, they make it clear who, in the name of the law, is allowed to commit the most hideous crimes.

title: The lighthouse island
overview: "The lighthouse island" recounts the story and legends of a mysterious and inhospitable island, also known as Rasa Island, not far from the city of Rio de Janeiro. Somewhere between historical rescue and invention, a silent family ventures across the sea in a small boat towards the island.
tagline: Fiction

title: Novembro
overview: Julio lives depressed until an unexpected encounter forces him to choose between drowning in past trauma or opening up to a new love.

title: Amores Artificiais
overview: The Knights of Good must face their most difficult enemy... Zaboo's mother.

title: Tempos
overview: TEMPOS celebrates friendship, moments and memories. Time is not wasted when it is lived.
tagline: Those sweet sweet days...

title: Sweet River
overview: Under pressure from a back pain and being constantly short of money, Tiago (played by Okado do Canal) experiences an encounter that will reshape everything he knew about his own father, instilling an imminent crisis in his way of being. Set amid the outskirts of Olinda and the Recife middle class, the film contrasts both worlds without ignoring or overlooking the complexity of human relationships. In this universe where rap beats and community life thrive, we glimpse through the cracks of a disintegrating family model the construction of another masculinity.

title: Nós Passarinhos
overview: In São Paulo, Mariza divides her time between her home office and coloring mandalas. Marcia paints the ceiling with the color of the sky. And Antônio, or Juninho, wants to stop working as an app driver and make a movie.

title: Lunch Break
overview: 1979. Four female workers have lunch break inside the ladies' room, at a metallurgical factory. Between laughs and scuffles, each one has a secret of their own.

title: Autopsy of Three Cognitive Systems
overview: Id, Ego e Superego, decide to put an end to her body host.

title: Shepherd
overview: A real test to the relationship of two brothers. "Guardião" accompanies the conflict between State and fraternal love.

title: The Night's Substance
overview: Jaiane now lives in Brazil, while Aissa, a Mozambican sailor who has just arrived in the city, tries to have a real experience on dry land. A story of unconventional passion follows.

title: The Aftermath
overview: Brazil, 2022. Luiza is a veterinarian whose life is torn apart after a global data leak exposes private user content from major social networks. A reflection on technology, friendship and solitude.

original_title: De Uma Tarde Sem Grandes Eventos
title: De Uma Tarde Sem Grandes Eventos
overview: A chaotic record of a vulgar discharge. Too long for nothing to happen.

title: Barriers
overview: In a not that distante future, humanity forgets how to speak with each other. In this world, leading the death of his ex wife, a man need to take his former step daughter to her grandmother's house.

title: As Tristes Lágrimas do Crocodilo
overview: The story of a boy too angry with internal demons who decides to kill himself. On the path of this decision he ends up hitting new surroundings, others exist, which may, perhaps, change his mind.

production_companies.name: PAULINHO MORREU ESFAQUEADO NO CHUVEIRO FILMES

tagline: Hum teorema vertiginoso

title: Extranjeros
overview: A homeless man is rescued from the street by a former psychiatric patient. Little by little, the guest tests the kindness of the host, until the host wants him out of the house. How far can our acts of kindness go?

title: Scarlet
overview: Former vigilant decide to come back to his old duty, meanwhile he must confront his alcoolism and try to return to his son's life.

title: Nucleus
overview: Between a experimental journey in the subconscious, a woman go through her introspective layers and bettle one of her powerfuls and misterious feelings.

title: Rain Walk Through Sun and Moon
overview: A writer goes into crisis and can no longer produce. She then embarks on an existential journey of self-knowledge between space, time and infinity.

title: Eventide
overview: Rafa senses an eminent farewell, remembering bygone places, encounters and fleeting connections.

title: Artificial Horizon
overview: Álvaro Cordeiro, a failed and depressed writer, fights against a creative block that keeps him from writing his next book. Leonel Carraça, producer of popular television works, discovers Álvaro and invites him to write his next novel. The writer resists the invitation, believing that his talent is to write the classic "great literature." However, financial difficulties make him accept.

title: Blindman's Buff
overview: Gabi believes in her ability to act in times of injustice, relying on her physical abilities. One day, Gabi finds out that her brother, Daniel, is a victim of bullying in their neighbourhood. Suffering from unexpected outbreaks of sleepwalking, he disappears from home during the night. While trying to avenge him, Gabi realizes that perhaps all the coinciding events related to her brother are a test made by ghosts of the past.

title: Bittersweet Power
overview: In one night, Lucas, Luiza and Bia remember the pains and delights of being who they are.

title: Découplage
overview: Découplage narrates the last day of relationship of two friends, in which the future of both is uncertain.
tagline: "it aint only the profit we split"

title: Florêncio Guerra e Seu Cavalo
overview: Is time a sentence? Florêncio Guerra, a simple old pawn, goes over life in this essay on humanity when he receives the difficult mission of his boss: to kill his horse!

title: lixo sentimental
overview: “I’m alive… I’m alive and vivo, muito vivo.”
tagline: don’t look back

original_title: o clamor da vã crença (ou: uma bela manhã secará nossas lágrimas)
title: the unbearable crying of vain belief
overview: Glimpses of memory. The ceaseless torment. Life. Death. Melancholy.
tagline: sobre a tormenta que invade todos nós

title: Desvirtude
overview: Kenia, a black journalism student, is attacked during an activity at the university, and has to deal with repercussions and retaliations in her case.

title: The Big Fight
overview: As Lorena gears up for a make-or-break fight, she battles anxiety and a hostile environment, risking her sports sponsorship dreams.
tagline: In order to win, Lorena must fight!

title: Deluge
overview: A family struggles to survive isolated from civilization, with the exception of a neighbor who lives nearby. A storm that has haunted them for the past four years, tests the family’s faith while they face their crop’s decay and other peculiar events.

title: Gift
overview: Caio receives a birthday "gift" from his friends -- a night with call boy Fernando. During the three hours of their meeting, the two will go from an initial aversion to a mutual and almost improbable attraction, slowly discovering and confronting the reality of both.

title: Five Minutes a Day
overview: Working in a small security kiosk, two men take advantage of the shift change to get to know each other and forge a touching bond.

title: Summerboy
overview: The story takes place in the summer of the 90s, in a small town in the state of São Paulo, and has 3 main characters, such as Lucas, Sister Lucélia and Augusto. Lucas is a 20-year-old religious boy and part of a youth group at the church, he is also Sister Lucélia's right-hand man, who is the same age and recently became a nun. Lucélia is worried about the actions of her brother, Augusto, and asks him to return to the small town and to participate in the youth group with the intention of returning him to the ways of God. So, she tasks Lucas with helping him on this journey. However, Guto's arrival puts Lucas' life upside down, as he teaches his sister's darling a new meaning of love. This process is both liberating and confusing for Lucas, who now, for more than 20 years, has had to come clean about everything that happened that summer. Embark on this story full of turning points and remember, each character hides a secret.

title: Tônia, a Diva no Espelho
overview: A romanticized biography based on testimonies and the trajectory of the great lady of the stage: Tônia Carrero (1922-2018).  In this final show, the actress mirrors with the audience decisive moments in her life and career, immersing herself deeply in the whirlpool of her memory. Among facts and memories narrated with her strong personality, she ends up unveiling a hidden fragility, which demystifies the human being behind this great persona, who fought until the end for her talent to be recognized above her undeniable beauty.

title: A Team of Two
overview: Flávio and Wendel are from the same soccer school and they share the dream of being a professional soccer player. Flávio is having doubts whether he should keep trying and when he thinks about quitting, Wendel realizes that what they feel for each other might be more than just friendship.

title: Nha Sunhu
overview: Issa, a footballer from Guinea-Bissau who plays in Portugal, is contacted by two filmmakers who want to know more about his life and make a documentary. Exposing the voices behind the camera, Nha Sunhu is a reflection on the gaze, bias, and representation of the other.

title: Hotel Royal
overview: 'In the course of my cleaning duties, I examined the belongings of each guest of the hotel and observed through the details, lives that will remain unknown', says the temporary Chambermaid in a large seaside hotel, which, unable to communicate, lives through a rigid methodology of analysis of the exterior and a ritualised quotidian. Until the uncontrollable comes to disrupts this dynamic.  Hotel Royal is fragmented and incomplete mosaic of contemporary societies. It could be dubbed a film about the horrors of the soul, about voyeurs or simply about misfits.

original_title: Todas as Rotas Noturnas Conduzem ao Alvorecer
title: Morning Has Broken
overview: Alexander just got out of prison. Lonely and silent, he finds some comfort in his friendship with Robson, his co-worker.

title: AGONIA
overview: Existential agony consuming a man, whose own abyss stares back at him. What will your price be?

title: Through the Heart and Soul
overview: "When the wax that inhabits the soul is deeply and abundantly, tenderly and sufficiently kneaded, every thing that is transmitted through the channel of sensations will be engraved in the heart of the soul” - Socrates
tagline: Through Emotions

title: The Waves
overview: The connection between the Portuguese coast line and the memories of someone's past.

title: Céu Na Terra
overview: In the middle of the Rio Carnival, Patrícia and Paula live their encounters and disagreements.

title: Dano Lunático
overview: The short film in a non-linear structure goes through the interpretation of timelines
tagline: Who is the lunatic?

title: Naticorda
overview: Sounds, nature and strings.

title: Almost Free
overview: "It's tomorrow, Chico. Can you believe it? ", says Romano to his cellmate. After so many years together, confined to that precarious iron box, the wait will finally come to an end. A few hours separates them from freedom. One will be released; the other, executed. Anyway, at sunrise, they won't be there anymore. It's their last moments, after all, it's almost morning.

title: How to Breathe Out of Water
overview: On the way back from the swimming practice, Janaina is violently approached by the police. Safe back home, she differently faces her relationship with her father Julio, who’s a policeman.

production_companies.name: Escola de Comunicações e Artes, Universidade de São Paulo

original_title: Às vezes sou pessoa, às vezes sou dinossauro
title: Às vezes sou pessoa, às vezes sou dinossauro

original_title: Quando Eu Soltar a Minha Voz
title: Quando Eu Soltar a Minha Voz
overview: Poetry and art through the musical performances of a black artist in Cinelândia, Rio de Janeiro.

title: Sunflower
overview: Daughter and mother live in harmony, until sudden news turned their world upside down.

title: Of the memories
overview: Of the memories that generate unique moments full of life.
tagline: Life in a box

title: Cacicus
overview: The exchange of messages in notes left in the clothes with Camila, a frequent client, brings the possibility of escaping from the noisy world of washing machines operating 24 hours a day for a moment of peace and silence.
tagline: Laura lives and works with her father in a laundry on the verge of bankruptcy.

original_title: Um Quadro do Pollock com Sangue
title: Um Quadro do Pollock com Sangue
A certain uneasiness
overview: A man eats breakfast during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Quando Pudermos
overview: David is a freelancer living with his girlfriend and their sick son. Problems arise when they don’t have money for his medication.

title: Baía de Luanda
overview: Pérola (39 years), a female lawyer, return to Angola, for her younger sister´s  “Alambamento” (traditional Angolan ceremony where dowries and promises are exchanged between a couple) more than 20 years living abroad.  On coming back, she realises that she does not fit in that environment anymore. The world that saw her come to life is now uncomfortable.  In the beginning, she remains apart, watching all her parents do and say in a judgmental way, but as the party unfolds, Pérola starts to see the beauty of the place.  That land and it´s People reveal a charm that she was not expecting and suddenly she understands that all her loneliness and emptiness she has felt all those years was only her home beckoning her back.

title: Élan
overview: André is a lonely man, cut off from the world around him. One day, he has to take care of his neighbor's dog.
tagline: Every new beginning begins with a small step..... or a little paw

title: In the Expectation of Memory
overview: Longing for a missed connection, a ghostly link to the past appears.

title: Concha de Água Doce
overview: After years living in the capital, Ariel returns to her hometown on the coast with a new identity, having to deal with all the feelings that have been internalized during her absence, while at the same time meeting up again with her younger sister, Ana.

title: O Fim da Imagem
overview: The existential crisis of the image haunting humanity.

title: Bang Shot
overview: A filming exercise becomes a memory of young Nico's crush and fall for his classmate, Iris.

title: Morning
overview: "Morning" tells the story of Miguel, a young man with psychological problems who finds it difficult to separate what is real and what is imaginary.
tagline: Morning

original_title: O Evangelho Segundo o Fascismo - A Ofensa Final
title: The Gospel According to Fascism - The Final Offense
overview: If Jesus came to Earth today, would his teachings and philosophy be in line with the agitated moods we live in today?  Batata Filmes presents a new collage project, mixing the playful Jesus of cinema with statements made by many of his followers, in an uncomfortable and provocative experience. Contains high offensive potential for small minds.

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

title: Moth Night
overview: Lira is an actress in the face of a world that is coming to an end. While artists are consumed, the moth flies through the night.

title: Ruídos de passos
tagline: Based on the short story by Clarice Lispector

title: Filme X
overview: A man breaks into people's houses at night and observes them, without stealing or violating anything. He simply looks, putting himself in their positions and searching for something he has lost within him, but not thinking that he could be being watched too.
tagline: A MOVIE ABOUT ANY MOVIE AND ITS' SPECTATORS

title: Delirium/Pleasure
overview: An unexpected guest shows up at a party, sparking unexplored feelings and fetishes between two couples.

title: Infantry
overview: In a conservative and swampy Brazil, a birthday party is held at a fatherless home. Joana, the birthday girl, wants to get her period soon. Her brother, Dudu, wants his father home. When teenager Verbena arrives unannounced, all the wishes can come true. But not without some pain.

title: Thin Skin
overview: While writing an adaptation of the play "4.48 Psychosis", by English playwright Sarah Kane. Luisa (Ingrid Trigueiro) travels to a desert beach with her family. Immersed in the text, Luisa finds the work's impulses increasingly immersed into her own reality, driving her to the threshold of adaptation and delirium. Between theater, sketch, archival images, and complex memories and family relationships, Arthur Lins uses different staging references to compose a small tropical tale about complex creation process.

title: I Am Her Daughter
overview: Amidst the covid-19 quarantine, a young woman makes video calls with 3 different woman under suspicious pretexts - but something bigger connects them.
tagline: a young woman in search for her origins

title: Diaries II: Tamara
overview: Stuck in an abusive relationship, Tamara doesn't see her tragic situation. On a special night, an accident might change it all. This is the second part of a short-film trilogy called Diaries where soulful transformations take place in one night of each character’s lives. It’s embuied with mystery and filled with fantasy, blurring the line of reality and imagination.
tagline: A woman faces herself and her toxic relationship

title: Diaries I: Eve
overview: Eve is a single soon-to-be mother and is tired of her own loneliness, doubting her decision to be a mother. On this night, Eve wakes up to face her doubts and on the brink of her crisis, an unexpected answer appears.
tagline: short-film about a pregnant woman facing her fears.

original_title: O Amor é mais Frio que a Morte
title: O Amor é mais Frio que a Morte
Cinema Whore Word
overview: After losing his home, town, work and love, a poet travels far away and eventually finds the way back through parallel dialogues with his absent friends.

title: God
overview: Gustavo is a young adult attending law school. He is outgoing and polite, much of his upbringing comes from his Catholic upbringing. Very religious, Gustavo has dual feelings about his sexuality.

title: Taste of Hope
overview: From a peculiar narrative, “Esperanza” builds a subtle and simple allegory about the phenomenon of immigration of people from other South American countries to Brazil, in a relationship that reveals places of approximation, but also historical and dramaturgical spaces that point to the effects of a certain imperialism that surrounds such processes. All this concentrated in the suffocated atmosphere of the protagonist.

title: Surrealist Overdose
overview: At a peculiar dinner party, an actress tries to survive amidst visions of her darkest nightmares. Without the slightest notion of space-time, the bewildered actress faces her fears and addictions, lost between what could be real or a figment of her imagination, dinner takes on a life of its own.
tagline: Between dream and reality

title: Non-Player Character
overview: Non-Player Character - a film by João Brás

original_title: Às Vezes Os Dias, Às Vezes A Vida
title: Às Vezes Os Dias, Às Vezes A Vida

original_title: Entre a Luz e o Nada
title: Between Light and Nowhere
overview: It’s summer and it feels like everything is melting. The body melts in sweat and the afternoon fades into endless nights. Weird dreams invade Shade’s sleep and unexplainable lights appear in the sky. Between work, home and friends, Shade seems to be floating. They are in suspension, in an intermediate state in which the reality of the world does not sustain itself.

title: Presente
overview: Son and mother misses each other and the good old times in a mix of reality, fiction, films and music.

title: A Boy named Jaime
overview: A short movie written and directed by André Marques.
tagline: A young boy lives in the illusion that the brutal behavior of his father is usual in our society, until the moment when he realizes that behavior will not end soon. To leave this the boy ends doing the unthinkable.

original_title: Todos Os Prêmios Que Eu Nunca Te Dei
title: All the Awards I Never Gave You
overview: An unexpected encounter between two young actors on the rise, in the bathroom of an award venue, brings up unresolved feelings and a love story that has possibly not come to an end yet.

original_title: Me Ame Como É Pra Amar
title: Love Me As You Should
overview: After his mom's death, Nicolas and his father try to overcome their grief, but things fall apart when a secret comes to light prematurely, forcing Nicolas to deal with three different ways of love.
tagline: Love ends... or changes?

title: Mistida
overview: An immigrant mother, hurting from a backache, calls for her son to help carry her groceries home. Along their way, they talk about the future through the past, returning to all of their disagreements, disillusionments, rancor and resentments.

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

title: The Daughters of Fire
overview: The story of three young cape-verdean sisters upon their arrival at a foreign European port, in an attempt to escape another devastating eruption of the volcano Fogo. In this unknown country, they roam, hand in hand, evoking their secret fears through music and singing.

title: Heterônimo
overview: Mariana lives at the bottom of the sea. One day, her teacher Cecília introduces her to Christian, a prince from another world.

title: 15 Dias
overview: Bianca, a 20-year-old girl, has a device on her arm that counts down the seconds until the day she dies. In the last 15 days of her life, she has to deal with missing her family and the presence of emptiness in her home.

title: Alambamento
overview: When Matias goes to deliver his dowry to his fiance's father, an unexpected accident makes him realize how much he is willing to fight for her love.

title: A Vida em Pauta
overview: Will, an illiterate young man in love with movies, works collecting the city's garbage until the day he finds something in the trash that may change his life forever.

title: Terra Queimada
overview: In 1810, Joaquim, Ana and their two kids are separated by the imminent Buçaco battle, while Lord Wellington and Commander Masséna prepare their armies.

title: Amores (a)Típicos
overview: Whether for neurotypical or autistic people, love doesn't have a unique way of expressing itself. There is no typical love. Relationships and romantic love are challenging for everyone. For autistics, then, the matter can gain other layers of complexity. Or is it not? Marcos Maia and Sophia Mendonça mediate this dialogue, with great guests.

title: Utopia
overview: Guel and Bomani are neighbors and live separated by a wall. One day they meet through a rift and begin to dispute the ownership of a kaleidoscope they found at the site. Maíra tries to solve it, but ends up getting into the fight over the object. How to reconcile all interests? A solution may be stored in the wall itself.

title: 78.4 FM
overview: In the late 80s, in Portugal, Manuel (18 years) and Alfredo (21 years) have been broadcasters for three years at a little pirate radio on the village they live, in the attic of Manuel’s house – the Pluto Radio. After being told by Alfredo that he was interning at an official radio Manuel, not admitting to Alfredo what he really felt about the news he struggles with the dilemma of continuing alone or not at all with the pirate radio they both had started and grew together.

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

title: Floating House
overview: It tells the story of Araci, a woman who saw her daughter murdered by ranchers. She emigrates to Mértola with her husband and their granddaughter, who will grow up without forgetting the indigenous rituals and teachings of Brazil.

title: Glória Iluminada
overview: Between the urgency of running away and wanderings, Glória exists in the strange instinct of the night and living crowd.

original_title: As Mil Palavras de Giacomo Geremia
title: As Mil Palavras de Giacomo Geremia
overview: The story of photographer Giacomo Geremia.

title: It'll Rain Tomorrow
overview: During the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020, Solange and Gustavo, mother and son, lose a family member to the virus. As they deal with grief and face this new reality, the relationship between the two shudders and wounds are reopened, leading them to question which of them was responsible for bringing the virus into their home.

title: SP Zero 15
overview: 15 directors telling 15 tales about São Paulo.

original_title: Quem Perdeu o Telhado em Troca Recebe as Estrelas
title: Quem Perdeu o Telhado em Troca Recebe as Estrelas
overview: A congolese immigrant can't find a job. A resident of an occupation is exoelled from home. He doesn't know where he is going, she has nowhere to go. Together they roam the night of the city.

title: Eddy
overview: This is a day in Eddy’s life.
tagline: Eddy is a young boy that dreams about his future, but reality confronts him every day with tough obstacles.

title: Vermelho Monet
overview: Follows the story of Johannes Van Almeida, a painter who was just released from prison and wants to start his life anew, but everything changes when art dealer Antoinette, and international actress in crisis Florence Lizz, get in his way.

title: Xavier and Miguel
overview: Xavier decides to shoot with his cell phone his weekend with his best friend Miguel to tell the world and his father, Nicolas, that he might be in love with him. Xavier and Miguel is the sequel of the short film Xavier (2015).

title: OROBORO
overview: A couple meets and stays together for a whole day.
tagline: One day, one couple, one story. An ending?

title: Léo, mas Depende Qual
overview: Internal conflicts turn external when Léo, a young queer man who does not quite understand the possibilities of his own being, is unable to perceive himself in the assimilated conditions of everyday life.
tagline: INSIDES TURN OUTWARD.

title: Rastro
overview: A football player and part-time fisherman starts to clean the beach he lives next to.

title: The Boat and the River
overview: Vera is a religious woman who takes care of a vessel in the port of Manaus. She needs to deal with Sister Josi with whom she disagrees about how to handle the boat and how to live life.

title: King Kong en Asunción
overview: An old hired killer is hiding in the interior of Bolivia, in the desert region of the Salar de Uyuni. You just committed your last murder. After months in isolation, he travels to the interior of Paraguay where he receives a good reward and heads to Asunción with the aim of meeting his daughter.

title: Hafsa
overview: Hafsa is a trans street dweller with a troubled past, who finds herself in conflict with the sexist world she lives in. When she meets Luna, Hafsa decides to make a change in herself and in the world.

title: Moço
overview: Confronted with his mother's infidelity and his father's emotional absence, João arrives at a sunset where he refuses to return home.

title: Before the Mountains
overview: A theft of water, a homicide, a question of honour, a tragedy in the village of Gralhas, Montalegre.

title: Redemption
overview: A young woman travels to solve a matter of life or death. As she seeks to do what she needs, the city exposes itself with its curious characters.

title: Nuance
overview: A reflection on the loneliness of the black woman and the challenges in strengthening the affective relationship.

title: Receita de Caranguejo
overview: After her father's death, Lari and her mother go for a trip to the family beach house. They decide to cook some crabs. And the animals, gradually, become luminous beings.

title: Chlorine
overview: Two different moments in his life. The first love and the real love. Traumas from the past stick like chlorine in water.

title: Manaus Hot City
overview: Two friends meet to eat a bodó fish. The talk between them goes through the colors and smells of the houses in the heat of the city. Someone stays and someone leave.
tagline: Manaus Hot City

title: No Place
overview: When Nego discovers that a cocoa farm where he lives and works will be sold, he needs to face not only the loss of his home and his job, but also the daily contact he has with the land he loves so much.

title: A Casa 668
overview: Short film about the dictatorship and all the problems that surround it.

title: The Wages of Sin
overview: A man enters a church and tells God of a robbery gone wrong.

title: Incorruptible
overview: Miguel is an honest worker who finds himself in a dilemma, between becoming a corrupt politician or continuing to do what he believes to be right, meanwhile, the angel Salatiel advises him for this difficult choice.

title: 4 Billions Infinites
overview: Brazil. 2020. A family lives with the energy of the house cut off. While the mother works, her children stay at home talking about having hope.

original_title: O que acontece quando nada acontece
title: What happens when nothing happens
overview: During a long period of isolation, two friends face the challenge of getting away from some important people, until an important message comes through a letter that was lost.

title: SUPERINFORMAÇÃO
overview: Having a lot of information does not mean that you are well informed.

title: CARTA AO PASSADO
overview: A young girl writes a letter and tells a little about her past.

title: Offline
overview: After a presidential decree that shuts off the Internet connection nationwide, two neighbours who have never met before but have an online relationship decide to leave the big city and try out a living in the real world.

title: Cidade Dormitório
overview: In 1988, brothers Flávio and Patrícia outline a plan to take Cassandra, the most popular girl in school, to bed. Thirty years later, separated by time, they still reside in the small town of Alvorada / RS, where their lives are interconnected by inhabitants of different social classes and obscure personalities.

original_title: Um Tordo Batendo as Asas Contra o Vento
title: A Thrush Flapping Its Wings Against the Wind
overview: Luis, a young worker on a farm, helps Vasco finish a contract to cut a huge amount of wood before winter, while his wife in Portugal is about to give birth. In the meantime, the tension increases and the distance becomes unbearable.

title: Nha Mila
overview: After fourteen years away from her homeland, Salomé is forced to return to Cape Verde to see her dying brother. During her stopover at Lisbon airport, Águeda, a cleaning lady, recognizes Salomé as "Mila", her childhood friend. Águeda invites Salomé to leave the airport and spend the stopover at her home, with the women of her family. The neighborhood transports her on a spiritual journey, whose destination reveals a painful bond with her homeland.

title: A Portrait of Butterflies
overview: Alexandra and Miguel meet regularly and passionately at her home. He has already started to create some expectations for the future. She is still trying to understand where that is going to take her. This gap between them leads them to confrontation in a way that will mark them for life

title: Alano
overview: Desires and frustrations emerge from the encounter of two characters, Miguel (a filmmaker) and Alano (a rent boy), where Alano’s pursuit of pleasure contrasts with Miguel’s quest for company.

title: A Provação
overview: Ana dreams about being a musical actress and must not be affected by the outside and inner challenges that prevent her from making her dreams come true.

title: Prisma
overview: A meeting between two friends and an unknown attraction. The borderline between the real and the imagined, the inside and outside, friendship and love, one body and another. Prism is the story of a connection between surfaces that being in touch wakes the shattered power of feelings.

title: Vista para dias nublados
overview: Manuela and Bento are a couple of retired artists that spend most of their days observing Lúcia, their window neighbor. Until one day, Lúcia stops opening the balcony of her apartment and Manuela finds herself trying to find new meaning for what she sees.

title: Ave Rara
overview: They all say that you killed an Angel. Who says that ? They. It’s not an Angel. It isn’t ? No. It’s a rare bird, just like you and me.

title: Rádio Capital Alvorada
overview: For decades, Brasilia was the stage of an iconic radio station. On its last day on the air, the few but captive listeners did not know that it was the end.

title: The Sunflower
overview: In a vast field of sunflowers, five children meet to play "ciranda", putting to the test all the social constructions historically created, resulting in a ideals confrontation.
tagline: sunflower

title: Temporal
overview: Being a woman is a state of becoming. Loving one is a state of being. And to be loving each other is to become power.

title: GAP
overview: A resident of a ghetto’s neighborhood of São Paulo amid the Covid-19 pandemic, Gustavo has severe anxiety attacks. When he receives a call from a friend who lives in the same street, he reflects different stories of neighborhood residents in parallel with his family's daily life during social isolation.
tagline: IT'S A LOOPHOLE THAT THE SYSTEM WANTED

title: Unliveable
overview: Just before the pandemic, the world experiences a phenomenon never seen before. Marilene looks for her daughter Roberta, a trans woman who went missing. While running out of time, she discovers a hope for the future.

title: Há Sempre um Amanhã
overview: Paulo Lima is an engineer responsible for a multinational factory. Due to the recession, the factory receives a visit from the factory's owner's daughter, Luísa, who is sent to increase the factory's profit. Some cuts are due to make.

title: The First Light Of The Day
overview: A window becomes a place of escape for a couple who live in a lonely and lost apartment.

title: Sobrevida
overview: In the midst of moral isolation, immoral transformation arises.

title: Julieta de Bicicleta
overview: Julieta rides her son's bicycle into the night. Her trip is interrupted by an attempted robbery, but she gets some help from a friend of her son.

title: Caio
overview: Caio's day-by-day in a moment when he rethinks his habits and relationships.

title: Corte
overview: At the core of a royal court unbalanced by the long absence of its King, where women seem to have disappeared along with reason, the Crown Prince is murdered. Wrapped in the plot of the promoters of a decaying libertine spirit, the heir’s brothers, a pair of twins united by the music they play together and their Valet, witness a hunt for the prepetator launched by the palace doctor's deduction. In the background of all the chatter rises the individual desire of the twins for the dynasty.

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

title: Subcutaneous
overview: The skin is not the limit.

title: A Pedra
overview: A young girl, traveling in the south of Angola, meets a retired doctor who deals with the memories of war and its perpetual waste. An adaptation of the short tale "The Dragonfly", by Ondjaki.

title: Here
overview: 2018, Christmas Eve. Arround the world, families gather to celebrate. In Brazil, two young men meet.

title: Love, Aline
overview: Aline looks back at her past, and from old printed pictures, she restores a love that had been left behind.

original_title: Nada de Bom Acontece Depois dos 30
title: Nothing Good Comes After Your 30's
overview: In a world where people don't age, the government finds itself facing a population crisis.  It is then created a government program to control overpopulation.  The program involves the killing of people who turn 30.  However, a man questions himself about this political doctrine during his last birthday.

title: Segredos
overview: Helena is doctor in a big hospital. One night she hears a love song through her window and starts living for that song that she hears everynight.

title: Confined
overview: "A young writer has a tought time trying to finish his book, in the midst of it, his terror seems to escape out of its pages"
tagline: Terror, Thriller, Short

title: Paciente
overview: On any given day, Brazil Democracy was walking through the dark streets in the Third World when it was shot by anybody who just wanted to be able to eat. In a coma fighting for survival, his life passes before his hope.

title: GLOVES
overview: A man comes home to fight his nightmares and instincts.
tagline: I have the  gloves

title: Bastien
overview: The story of a 24 year-old, who grew up in an institution for six years and returned home of their host family. He lives with his younger brother Zezito and his adoptive grandmother, Dona Angustina.

title: The Lamb of God
overview: The summer festivities of a Portuguese village are suffused with sensuality and violence in this enigmatic portrait of a tightly knit family.

title: Mina Kiá
overview: Tónia is an outgoing, sensitive and cheerful girl who dreams of being a journalist. Her life changes when her mother sends her to her uncles' house in the city, where she begins to suffer abuse. With so many obstacles, will Tonia reach her big goal?

title: Calou-se. Saiu. Saltei.
overview: When reaching adulthood, a young woman talks about her days within a dysfunctional family; her fears, wishes and frustrations, that lead her on an unwavering quest for a peace that stubbornly doesn’t come.

title: Top 10 Places to Visit in São Paulo
overview: On a Sunday, two photographers walk around São Paulo trying to connect with the city, and slowly fall in love with each other.

title: Everything's OK
overview: A father's journey to save his son.

title: Outono
overview: From a lifetime, a single memory has survived. Only one.

title: Sopros na Pele
overview: Sensations on the skin during a pandemic.

title: Vislumbres
overview: An intimate and fictional tour through the cravings contained and corroded words of the writers Clarice Lispector and Maria Telles Ribeiro.

title: Travessia
overview: A young gay boy from the Brazilian interior has a secret crush that turns in his worst nightmare. Based on real homophobic and violent events.

title: Fidalga
overview: The eternal guilt, the attempt at redemption, the infinite ramifications. There is no turning back to what Marília has done.

title: Menarche
overview: In a Brazilian village infested with piranhas, Nanã and Mel are fast growing into adolescence as they dream of ways of protecting themselves against a seemingly inescapable violence. When a mysterious body appears tangled in a fisherman's net, they learn what might be their ultimate protection.

title: O Mundo de Dentro
overview: "O Mundo de Dentro" addresses the generation of the 1960s, especially the shock caused by the AIDS cases that started to appear in the post-dictatorship period in Brazil.

title: Nightender
overview: Paulo works in a bar and when his shift is over he wonders through the Lisbon night. Between a romantic and desolate tone, Flávio Gonçalves films in the poetry of the night. A poetry made of encounters, ferocious lights and bodies that love and fear.
tagline: A new short film by portuguese filmmaker Flávio Gonçalves

title: I Want to Be Helena
overview: Iza is a young black woman who lives with her aunt and studies at a private school surrounded by white colleagues. In Iza's eyes she just wanted to be more like Helena, the most popular girl at Laura Fontenelle school.

title: Jornal Letal
overview: During what appeared to be just another ordinary day on small town news, an unexpected and tragic accident occurs.
tagline: An unexpected accident occurs in the news.

title: Olhares
overview: Junior, an eight years old, navigates the world in curiosity. He notices that one thing in his family is very unusual, one thing he sees everywhere he looks except in his family. Now, Junior starts looking for what they lack.

title: And Have to Have Why?
overview: In the even more conservative Curitiba of the 1960s, a young man emerged with a spontaneous way of writing poetry. The marginal poet drank directly from the aura of the counter-culture movement of his time. This is Paulo Leminski, the Pole of the pine forests.

title: Quando as Pedras Dilatam
overview: Rita sings a city with different facades and corners. Faced with the huge amount of murders in Rio de Janeiro, certain places reveal that the past is a present and spaces emanate our history.

title: Escola Sem Sentido
overview: Chicão is a passionate history teacher in a private school. A student records his classes and shows the film to her parents, who denounce the teacher for ideological indoctrination. The case gains unprecedented proportions in the school.

title: In Limbo
overview: Life in spite of everything.
tagline: That guy is a nihilist trying to wake up.

title: Primavera
overview: Moments before a father's death, all of his family memories are transferred to his son through a dream, from the first ancestor, an Englishman living at the end of the 18th century, to his Brazilian heirs, the protagonists of this story.

title: Conflicts
overview: Nathalia and Daniel are best friends. But what happens when her boyfriend, Yuri, tries to seduce Daniel?

original_title: Partida de Vôlei à Sombra do Vulcão
title: Partida de Vôlei à Sombra do Vulcão
overview: Mesmerized by the image of an active volcano on the other side of the world, a woman sets out to meet her fury. On the way, without being able to return, she finds herself in an extraordinary pregnancy, starting the account of the journey that gives shape to this play-film, a journey between theater and cinema inspired by the narratives of fantastic realism.

title: Dreams
overview: A documentary filmmaker sleeps with his camera to film the dreams he has at night.

title: Luazul
overview: Riva returns to Brazil and finds herself more alone than ever. Flavia has no time to feel lonely. Their lives intersect and they dream around the soccer fields.

title: Thank you for Being Here
overview: When Sofia's mental health starts to take a toll on her relationship with Júlio, they find out that there are things they can't solve together.
tagline: THERE'S NOTHING WE CAN'T SOLVE

title: Ficções Sônicas #2
overview: Ficções Sõnicas #2 is a film-play made in downtown São Paulo, during the pandemic. In history, they occupy the Municipal Theater and rehearse a play without an audience, in a search path that awakens them from the inaction and automation of sensitivity. The film-play is part of the Sonic Fictions Project, idealized by Grace Passô, where a series of artistic creations are made to experience children and act on the basis of black lives in diaspora.

title: Ingra!
overview: Ingra's faith is shaken when she realizes she is being haunted by her criminal past.

title: O Bairro
overview: Five people have their lives crossed at the place where the law is made by whoever takes the first step.
tagline: EVERYTHING HAS A PRICE. EVERYTHING.

original_title: Avá - Até Que os Ventos Aterrem
title: Avá - Até Que os Ventos Aterrem
overview: 53,000 years before or after anyone. for three days the axis of the earth has stopped. The sun and moon inhabit the earth's horizon at the same time, aligned. The vibrations on the surface have reduced considerably, we are now very close to vital ground zero. Plant cells and human hemoglobin need to meet. There is only one moment for photosynthesis. The horror of the tropics gnawed at every eye. Free the condensed particle of everything.

title: Maputo Nakuzandza
overview: It's dawn in the capital of Mozambique. Young people leave the nightclubs and, in the backyards, women start their day. A man runs, a woman arrives from a trip, a tourist takes a walk, a worker takes the public transportation and the Maputo Nakuzandza radio station announces the disappearance of a bride.

title: The Last Page
overview: Two people share a conversation in a park bench.

title: O Dia Seguinte
overview: A disappearance brings up a couple's toxic relationship.
tagline: WHAT HAPPENED THAT NIGHT?

title: Girassol
overview: A young woman is uncertain about motherhood.

title: A Qualquer Custo
overview: A young business man is the new promise on the countries' politics, but a group of journalists uncover a secret from his past putting his nomination at risk.

title: Outono em Porto Alegre
overview: Four different love stories in Porto Alegre.

title: Limite
overview: Pamela meets a misterious man, something her agent is not at all happy about.

title: Irreversível
overview: The choices we make while looking for a second chance might be irreversable.
tagline: WE ALL HAVE A BREAKING POINT

title: At Sixteen
overview: What do you do with the desire that is just awakening? At dance performances, in concerts, during sports, while skating, eyes are searching and bodies are exposed. Each space possesses its own choreography, its own music. Almost without words desire and rejection, hope and disappointment become tangible.

title: Sunday Morning
overview: Gabriela is a young black pianist who will perform at her first major recital. However, a dream about her late mother destabilizes Gabriela's mind and heart, jeopardizing her performance. From a series of encounters over the course of a day, Gabriela will embark on a journey of reconciliation with her memories and her mother.

title: The Kitchen
overview: The Angolan Civil War still casts its shadow across the life of a young widow. The camera wanders through the rooms in her house, recording everyday objects and activities, while she describes how the war entered the family in a poetic monologue.

original_title: Não Posso Ver O Céu Daqui
title: Can't See Heaven From Here
overview: Forced to become a mother, Helena plans to run away with her boyfriend and abandon her son. However, on the day of the escape, the boy gives up and leaves her alone, desolate. Determined to keep on the run, Helena embarks on her theory that her entire life has been a lie and she has never had a child.

title: Espresso
overview: Aspiring writer Camila searches for inspiration for her next novel. What she didn't imagine, is that her own story would be being written in the process.

title: A Casa da Minha Mãe
overview: Joana, mother to Vicente, is slowly transforming into a woman-wolf hybrid. Vicente, who has been feeling more and more distant from his mother, lives through a brief event that separates this day from others, gaining hope that the relationship between the two isn’t doomed, and imagines how their joint healing process would be.

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

tagline: The hairs at least keep me warm

title: A Menina da Estrada
overview: Love, Possession, Betrayal, Jealousy, Selfishness. And it is a reinterpretation of the traditional Stories of treasures buried during the War of the Triple Alliance, which deeply marked Brazil – especially the Pantanal people – since 1864. It is based on Alvarenga's manuscripts from when he lived among the Kadiwéu, Kinikinanau, in the village São João, between 2002 and 2004.

original_title: A Arte de Andar Pelas Ruas de Brasília
title: A Arte de Andar Pelas Ruas de Brasília
overview: Brasilia is the scenery for the encounter between two girls. Ana and Leila share a friendship and the typical teenage coming of age.

original_title: Quando o Tempo de Lembrar Bastou
title: Quando o Tempo de Lembrar Bastou
Past Tense
overview: In search of information about his mother's student past, Marcos makes discoveries that strongly change his perception about her.

title: Empty House
overview: Raúl is an unemployed cattleman that lives in an isolated house on the fields. The landscape of pastures is being superimposed by huge soy plantations. Devastated by poverty, he joins a gang of other peasants that steals cattle during the darkness of the nights on the pastures.

title: Noctiluzes
overview: A mysterious blind man is visited by two strangers on a pier, and they share stories that seem pure nonsense. Each of them has a reason for being there, but no one wants to reveal it, and conflict becomes inevitable.

title: The Breeze That Brought You
overview: In a search for peace and belonging, Manoel crosses paths with Sandoval, a young man endowed with mysterious super powers.

title: The Ants' Vertigo
overview: Experimental short film entirely recorded by cell phones, where the director puts his impressions on the world of ants and relates to society.

title: E Aí, Abraão?
overview: In the midst of everyday challenges, a peripheral teenager tries to face life's obstacles and will have to decide which path to follow.

title: Os Dragões
overview: Five adolescents in a conservative community experience strange transformations in their bodies. Faced with rejection in the town and the fear of adult life, thye must decide if they accept their dragon aspect or conform to the tedium and local conventions. The Dragons is an immersion in the fantastic universe do writer Murilo Rubião.

title: Amo-te de Morte
