overview: After starting a secret relationship, Anabela decides to reveal to Carla that she plans to flee Lisbon, keeping her romance away from her father. Opposed to the idea, Carla discourages her, suggesting she should rethink. Anabela, feeling helpless, surrenders to her own thoughts, making decisions without support.

title: Desterro
overview: Salome goes out for another day at work, but not without bringing a definitive closure to a delicate occurrence.

original_title: Será Que O Sol Vai Voltar?
title: Will The Sun Come Back?
overview: A young aspiring songwriter gets a great opportunity to write a song and can't let her inner conflicts get in the way of her creative process.

Bruno, a young obsessed, unemployed and lonely man, falls in love with his female neighbor, who arrives at her apartment always at the same time. Bruno, who wants to know her better, goes down the stairs just to interact with her in the short elevator trip back.

title: Harám
overview: Harám tells the story of Salwa, a Muslim inmigrant who flees the Palestine war and finds shelter in Salvador with her husband Farid. Just arrived, Salwa meets Felicia, a ten-year-old girl who lives a few meters away from her place, soon, some sort of cultural exchange will begin to take place between them

title: Love at 3rd Sight
overview: Léo is a very boring guy with a mediocre life. He doesn't drink, he doesn't smoke, he doesn't go out to have fun, he barely talks to his mother, he doesn't like people, he has no friends except his adorable fish he calls Cyclops. It's Valentine's Day and everyone is with their date, except Léo, who feels the need to meet someone. After all, he's almost a grown man and can't live his whole life in his own apartment. Bored, Léo downloads a dating app and decides to meet someone who will make his heart beat faster. His life turns upside down when he meets the charming Bia, a bisexual, feminist, tattooed, and full of attitude girl who soon piques his interest and invites her on a date. But Léo has a big secret that he's been keen to hide from everyone forever, he has a third eye.
tagline: Léo's life turns upside down when he meets Bia, a girl full of attitude that piques his interest. But Léo has a big secret he wants to hide from everyone, he has a third eye.

title: um tanto mais
overview: After 7 years living abroad, the son comes home to try and reconnect with his father. Over the dinner table they share a meal, memories, grievances and so much more that needed said but never was.  After so long apart, what will be different this time?
tagline: what will be different this time?

original_title: Só Pelo Amor Vale a Vida
title: Só Pelo Amor Vale a Vida
How To Live Fully
overview: The brief past and present of two boys.

title: Inch
overview: A young man invites some strangers to an orgy, but when he suspects he has been drugged, he calls his transgressive psychiatric for help. But the disconnected messages and interpretations lead both of them to an extreme situation in which daydreams and reality are confused.

title: To the Beyond
overview: The story is about a young ghost starting her training, she needs to ask for help from a Helper to get back to Earth on Halloween and be reunited with her family before the portal closes.
tagline: Imagine finding that one person and having a few minutes to talk, or rather, try to talk

title: Snowboarding
overview: After news of an accident reaches him a year after the fact, Elias, a young contemplative student, is stuck with strange emotions that he can't explain as he tries to figure out why he feels the way that he is and encounters some revealing conversations along the way.

title: David is Dead
overview: Returning its activities in the middle of the pandemic, a theater company tries to record a play. But one of the actors hears the news that David, one of his colleagues, died. While the news fills the theater halls, the actors react to it differently and David's presence is reconstructed through mourning.
tagline: A group of theater actors deals with the death one of its colleagues.

title: Alone
overview: In a post-apocalyptic world, three strangers are hiding on an abandoned house, learning about each other's past and hoping to stay alive.

title: A Última Valsa
overview: Elias and his children return home after a grueling day that will change their lives. Amidst unspoken words, hidden conflicts, they just try to get through this day.

title: The Ballerina
overview: Marta is passionate about her new hobby: bird-watching. Before her big audition to become a professional dancer, she tries to gather courage to tell her mother that she doesn't want to dance anymore.

title: A Última Sopa
overview: After a harsh break up, Renato and Sofia meet one last time to discuss what went wrong in their relationship.
tagline: CAN I HUG YOU ONE LAST TIME?

original_title: A Praia do Fim do Mundo
title: A Praia do Fim do Mundo
overview: Young Alice lives with her mother Helena in Ciarema, in a house facing the sea. The residence suffers from the advance of the sea levels. The daughter, an environmentalist, plans to move elsewhere, but the mother wants to stay in town. They need to find a solution together.

title: Three Months
overview: A girl and a boy are introduced to each other by a friend and are encouraged to start a relationship.

title: Be Strong Like a Flower
overview: Two boys who just left high school meet in a party and begin to grow a unique relationship.

title: Sun
overview: A recently divorced father, who cannot reconnect with his 10-year-old daughter, is forced to travel with her to the countryside to meet his own father, who abandoned him as a child and now is an old man who wants to die. The forced intimacy with the father he hates and the immediate connection between daughter and grandfather test all his limits, but might also be the chance to get closer to his daughter again.

title: Safety First
overview: Returning from their wedding anniversary, Carlos and Marta Cavalcanti are surprised by an invasion in their house, something that will forever change their family.

original_title: A Filha Favorita do Terceiro Mundo
title: The Third World's Favorite Daughter
overview: Daisy, a young bumpkin, dates Deltan, a christian. Richard, her punk former boyfriend, doesn't like that and proposes a modern solution: a polygamous relationship.
tagline: LOVE FORGIVES EVERYTHING

title: Homing
overview: In the bucolic countryside of Brazil, Marcelo, an easygoing cowboy at a cattle farm lives for one passion: rodeos. One tragic incident affects him deeply. Little by little he overcomes the trauma and is ready to dream again.

original_title: A Matança Ritual de Gorge Mastromas
title: A Matança Ritual de Gorge Mastromas

original_title: Os Monstros Só Saem À Noite
title: Monsters Come Out At Night
overview: What would we be able to do for love? How far could we go in an extreme situation? Is there a monster inside each one of us waiting to reveal itself? Guilherme is a young man like many others, with dreams and aspirations, until one day his grandfather’s health puts him to test.

title: Colmeal
overview: From a certain idea of Rousseauian rural purity, “Colmeal” is settled in the small homonymous village located in Riba-Côa, also known as ghost village, due to the effects of the rural exodus and the inland desertification. In an allegorical way, quite worked on the natural elements and the sound elements, the film tells the story of a young man who lives isolated and who obsessed by a woman who comes from the city to spend her summer vacation. Gradually, the young man tries to overcome the inability to deal with his emotions, seeking to discover himself, emotionally and sexually. Márcio Laranjeira and Sérgio Brás d’Almeida are debutants in Curtas Vila do Conde and propose a return to the themes of growing pains and transition to adulthood, with young people trying to find their place in the world and to define their personality, especially in context of social and loving relationships.

title: Summer Rain
overview: It's Sérgios's birthday. His friends, the guests, the music, all the party are calling him to celebrate. However, Sérgio doesn't seem to be so comfortable.

title: Ordinary Time
overview: One of the most far-reaching events in a human life is the birth of your baby. But life with a newborn can be so ordinary and at the same time all-embracing: the wash is drying in the corridor, the bathroom has to be cleaned. In the calm rhythm of the day, 'Ordinary Time' skims past authentic moments like this.

title: Alexandria
overview: Books vanish from a library. A daughter says goodbye to her mother. A writer struggles with Alzheimer's disease.

title: Mouth of Furnace
overview: Ordered by an authoritarian and delusional king, a delivery cyclist must bring a cake before everyone else or he will be beaten. At this intersection, between play and reality, the objects come to life and seek the answer to the question: "What is Brazil?".
tagline: Mouth of Furnace

title: Vazio
overview: Empty was the only feeling she hoped not to have at the night full of emotions.

title: Entre Páginas
overview: A short film about two best friends, Sofia and Catarina, wrapped up in a mystery book written by Sofia’s grandfather that might be the key to solving her problems.

title: Emptiness
overview: Data from the World Health Organisation (WHO) indicates that 340 million people worldwide, suffer from depression. This represents approximately 850 000 suicides a year. The WHO also warns that 75% of people with depression don't receive adequate treatment. There are more and more requests for help from people alone, depressed and with suicidal thoughts. 'Vazio' is the story of a middle-aged man who has lost everything and is faced with the most overwhelming of all evil: the emptiness.

title: A Dois Passos do Paraíso
overview: More than 25 years after the song "A Dois Passos do Paraíso", from "Banda Blitz", hit radio stations all over the country, the film recreates the story of "Mariposa Apaixonada de Guadalupe" and the truck driver Arlindo Orlando.

title: Fotógrafo de Família
overview: Set in 2005, Castelo is a traditional photographer who reflects technological changes at a time when digital photography begins to take over the market.

title: LADRÃO
overview: Jeferson is a young man who makes his living as a delivery boy. One day, after having his motorcycle stolen, Jeferson will have to resort to desperate measures to get back to work.

original_title: As coisas infinitas: Menino com boné
title: Boy Cap
overview: "Passion during monster attacks."

title: Paranoia ou Mistificação
overview: Anita Malfatti goes through a deep desolation after the critic "Paranoia ou Mystification" by Monteiro Lobato to his famous 1917 exhibition, which highlights the beginning of the modernist movement in Brazil. Anita struggles to overcome the biggest disappointment of her life, her best friend Mário de Andrade tries to help her overcome what happened, with time Mário resorts to Oswald de Andrade and the two try to convince Anita to participate in the Modern Art Week of 1922.

original_title: Obrigado pela parte que me toca
title: Thank you for the touching part
overview: After losing his memory, Artur returns to a place of his past where he makes discoveries about himself.
tagline: Your dreams won't tell you anything you don't already know

title: Jellyfish
overview: Luiza and Renato, opposites bound by grief and an interrracial relationship,  face a parralel between lost loved ones and the fate of their own love.

production_companies.name: universidade federal do rio grande do sul

title: João
overview: Liquid love and sexual freedom of a young gay man in the Amazon. Put that in a blender and we have "João".

title: The Night Hunter
overview: A man follows a prostitute and her client into a seedy hotel room in the middle of nowhere. He is looking for something only she can deliver. Every night it’s the same thing: blood and more blood.

title: She Came Along
overview: Delcides waits for Tatiane. They will spend an afternoon together, for the first time. A chance to talk, to know each other, without anybody else around. However, hidden by the seemingly inoffensive conversation, there is a world of feelings. Anxiety. Shyness. Insecurity. Fear. Until the sunset, a relationship can be born. It all depends of a kiss.
tagline: She came along ...it must be because she likes me

title: There are Monsters in the Dark
overview: On a farm in the north of Portugal with a vineyard surrounded by a forest, where the past and present mix, a mother and a daughter, in a fight for reconciliation, try to overcome the anguish that still torments them. Will there be a change after this fight?

title: De Volta Aos Primórdios
overview: As he goes about his daily routine, he comes to the realization that this is not just another normal day. Clearly, something is wrong.

title: De Volta A Ti
overview: Short film about two elderly people who find love again.

title: The Denial
overview: Once Maria refused her childhood friend's marriage proposal, she sees herself forced to marry him due to her father's wishes. Therefore, she faces multiple versions of her future, to decide her next step.

title: Adeus Azul
overview: The love and the weight of guilt between the emotional distances of a relationship.

title: You are not dead yet
overview: Maria is one of the many women who were born without knowing their place. She tries to move between the mansion where she lives with her husband and a third-class hotel, her refuge. Things are piling up, trapping her in a certain deadline to take a decision. Leaving or staying?

title: Valley of Soul
overview: A black family tries to defend their land against invaders but gets caught between a mischievous witch and a tortured spirit eager for revenge.

title: Outrora
overview: As the bond between Beni and Ariel unravels, silence takes the place of words, leaving a trail of uncertainties. While Beni seeks to understand what happened, the deafening void of absence speaks louder, revealing the complexity of a hitherto fragmented relationship.
tagline: The trail of uncertainties becomes larger in silence.

title: Sanity in Memory
overview: From the beginning of the idea of ​​civilization, encompassing the ends of life, ending at the end of human intellect and the world.

title: November
overview: Music and black and white photos create the narrative of a woman's reflections on the passage of time and mortality.

title: Caixa Preta
overview: An airplane pilot is hired to transport what he thinks are antiques, but when the police suspects there might be something more to it he sees himself in trouble with everyone involved.

title: Flow
overview: First volume of a trilogy about anguish. A political-marital dystopia that follows a couple in crisis. Carla kicks Rodrigo out of the house, but he can't leave the apartment because of a lockdown imposed by the authorities. Thus, the two are forced to live together and end up reviewing their concepts, until things around take a turn never imagined.

title: The Drifter
overview: The tale of a writer who gets fed up with his life. Entranced by hallucinations, he is taken on a visually-striking surrealistic journey, guided by the sage Faust, finally breaking free from the Cockroach-like degeneracy of civilization.

title: Dália
overview: After decades apart, a sad widower reengages with his high school sweetheart. Now at an old age, they decide to overcome past traumas to finally be together.

title: Faith in Prayer
overview: The medium-documentary entitled "Faith in Prayer" is a dive between the Faith and the spirituality of three praying womans living in the hinterland of Itaparica.
tagline: Church doesn't save anyone, who saves us is jesus christ

title: À sombra do mar
overview: Teacher and human rights activist Josimar falls in love with Luís but needs to delve into himself and understand himself in a new context of life and identity after receiving news that shakes him.

title: Carta ao Pai
overview: Carta ao Pai is an experimental film that tells the raw and sensitive story of a daughter who lost her father in a traumatic way and who sees the need to bury the past by telling him everything she didn't have time to say.

title: Unlatched
overview: After a few years, Mateus and Bruno meet again and a story without an end is about to resurface.
tagline: Be my lover, be my love

title: Memória
overview: Emotional memory, past memory. Digital memory, RAM memory. Short memory.

original_title: Eli Sibita, sua arte sua VIDA
title: Eli Sibita, her art her LIFE
overview: Actress and folklorist Zulmira Bezerra, popularly known as Sibita, still keeps her art alive by passing on her knowledge to new generations and offering us great performances. The actress became nationally known for playing Dona Raimunda in the hit comedy OH, WHAT A LIFE!, and the charismatic Vó Iaiá in the drama APRIL FLOWER, both feature films by filmmaker Cícero Filho.

title: Over Here, Nothing New
overview: Alex is a young adult from a social housing district. When he left his home in the morning, he faces a situation apparently out of the ordinary.

title: Trago Seu Amor
overview: People experience different conflicts in their love relationships. Definitive moments in which ties are strengthened or broken. Everywhere there is death, the feeling of the imminence of something terrible, the impression of an end.

title: Shimmering Bodies
overview: The afternoon Jorge asks Mariana over for a weekend at his house in Leiria, she starts to see him in a whole new light. Unsure of her friend’s intentions, Mariana accepts his unexpected and baffling invitation.

title: The river and the labyrinth
overview: On one side of the Tagus river, Clara just moved to her new apartment. On the other side, a man wanders the night. As time unfolds both margins slowly merge, and what seems left behind in the past can always be waiting in the future.

title: Súlu S'Áua
overview: The exploration of an island dominated by violence and ghosts, where the only solution for the return to peaceful coexistence, between the world of the living and that of the departed, is to settle the debts of the past.

title: Death in August
overview: An early death by drowning leads to different ways of reacting among members of a group of friends. While some revolt, others move away from reality, looking for comfort in a virtual world.

title: Just the Two of Us
overview: In a small apartment in Lisbon a young girl is looking to get her life together, while dealing with the pressure of living up to her parents' expectations.

title: April Flower
overview: The movie follows the trajectory of Teresa, a naive and romantic young woman who becomes a victim of a series of extreme circumstances.
tagline: The pursuit of love and big losses.

original_title: Ás vezes, durante o dia, percebo coisas
title: Sometimes during the day I realize things
overview: Using mixed techniques and experimental elements, the director intends to explore the relationship between him, the cinema, the actor and the spectator.
tagline: Self-cinema

original_title: O Tempo e a Vontade de Ficar
title: O Tempo e a Vontade de Ficar
volatile white
overview: Inspired by the works of portuguese artist Julião Sarmento, this is a movie about the self and the other. About the reflection and obsession on the human condition that is us.

title: History of the Eye – A Porn-noir Fairy Tale
overview: A free adaptation of the novel History of the Eye, by Georges Bataille, Janaina Leite investigates the relationship between theatre and pornography, a recurring theme in her last shows, in which it is claimed as a scenic art. Hybrid between fiction and non-fiction, Story of the Eye – A Porn-noir Fairy Tale mixes 13 performers, some amateur and sex workers including a porn actor, a camboy, and a camgirl. With the collaboration of erotic film director Lara Duarte and multi-artist André Medeiros Martins, who performs works on art and pornography on different platforms, the play follows the structure of the book to tell, in fairy tale settings, the story of three teenagers in their sexual discoveries. During intermezzo, the audience watches a gig with live music and performances. Between the blatant theatricality and the explicit of pornography, the show recreates this fable noir among the vulgar and the sublime, mundane and cosmic, ordinary and abyssal.

title: Fruity
overview: Pedro e Felipe are two 11-year-old boys who are very different but fall in love with each other. However, they will have to face prejudice and their own insecurities to be together.
tagline: Have Courage to Love!

original_title: Não sei mais o que é saudade
title: I don't know what nostalgia is anymore
overview: With mixed techniques, the short film "I don't know what nostalgia is anymore" brings a gameplay recording of the game "project zomboid" as the basis for a film that seeks to represent what loneliness means to human beings and how much we can find ourselves even without any help.
tagline: A man in a devastated world is looking for something to lean on.

title: Em Uma Noite Qualquer
overview: On the last day of the year, strangers cross each others lives at moments of doubt and anxiety.

title: Love Lingers
overview: Isolated at home, Jonas reflects on his relationship with his boyfriend and best friend, who are hospitalized during the pandemic.

original_title: Nem Toda História De Amor Acaba Em Morte
title: Nem Toda História De Amor Acaba Em Morte
Our Ladies
overview: The elderly ladies take a trip to get their sister out of her depressed state. On the way and at the final destination, unexpected events will be decisive for the elderly woman's cure.

original_title: Aura: Um curta perdido e multicolorido
title: Aura: Um curta perdido e multicolorido

original_title: Júpiter: Um curta singelo e sincero
title: Júpiter: Um curta singelo e sincero

original_title: as flores e as dores que ele me deu
title: the flowers and sorrow he gave me
overview: Inspired by moments of the Brazilian writer Gabriel Yared’s life and mixing storytelling and poetic declamations by the author himself, the film presents us the love overgrowing between two young man, Alex and Luís, their comfortable couple routine, and explores which limits that love can support when, like dry flowers, it faces the hard and cold earth of deceptions and expectation breaches, with the city of Macapá, in ther Northern Brazilian State of Amapá, as background.

title: A Leaf of Winter
overview: We all carry our leaves, some of winter, some of spring and summer. But all leaves grow, breathe and wither with time; and so do we.

title: Scar
overview: A car accident triggers several events, revisiting the past and questioning the veracity of the present. A story full of twists, revelations, a time travel in the life of a couple.
tagline: When two women share the same man.

title: Where Have You Been?
overview: The portraits of a young man who has lost his creativity.
tagline: Where Have You Been?

original_title: A Relutância Em Nos Querer Longe
title: A Relutância Em Nos Querer Longe

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

title: Mad Dog Fever
overview: On a hot summer day, the emotional turmoil of a family facing a divorce reaches its peak when Napoleão decides to stop barking.

title: Quartzo
overview: Ariel is a painter who finds herself stuck in a creative slump that threatens her sanity. Meanwhile, her ego takes the shape of an Astronaut, looking for something that might awaken her from this creative and psychological state

title: We Gaps
overview: A short film about two women living the immensity of their lives
tagline: The gaps between two lives

title: Vanette
overview: Eva and Sónia, orphans in their twenties, with very different backgrounds from each other, are in a romantic relationship held only by a van in which they live in and travel across the country.

title: White
overview: Seven colors are assigned to eat the food of their own color. They don't question it, until one of them wants to take a different path.

title: The Beads
overview: Two young women retreat to a remote holiday home. While one of them undertakes a medical abortion, the other quietly cares for her. A snake slithers around them, unnoticed.

title: Solange
overview: Solange wants her stuff back. She moved out of town five years ago and now returns to retrieve her belongings, which she left in boxes at friends' homes.

title: Love Above All
overview: Shortly after leaving a troubled relationship, Italo falls in love with Daniel, his new neighbor. After discovering that Daniel is an ex-con, Italo feels pressured to question his feelings for the boy.
tagline: Is love above all?

title: Baleia
overview: Jonas lives in a seaside town and has to deal with people leaving his town all the time. After his friend Giovanna has to move to the big city, Jonas isolates himself in his room taking turns between reading and watching with curiosity his neighbor, Gaspar, through the window. However, one day he hears a strange, incessant noise coming from his neighbor's house, a noise that seems to be being transmitted by a new girl in town, Sophia.

title: The Sundays
overview: Past and present collide over two different Sundays as Sabrina attempts to reconcile the painful memories of a troubled relationship with a worn-out affair in the present.

title: Dissonant
overview: Roberto Ronan is a musician and piano teacher who receives the news that his father is sick. He returns to his hometown and spends some time in the house where he grew up. There the conflict that Roberto has with his younger brother, Henrique, grows at the same time as revelations about his family history are exposed.

title: Birds
overview: Jonas and David are best friends who spend their times watching soccer games on TV despite cheering for opposite teams. In one particular afternoon, as another game progresses, they discuss the girls they want to meet at a party they'll attend later on. However, with a strange tension in the air and some secrecy from one of them it all might change the course of their lives.
tagline: Everything can change in an instant

title: TransParente
overview: By approaching the process of sexual reassignment, the work mixes data and experiences, focusing on family relationships and the nuances of the feminine.

title: O Não Visto
overview: In this unofficial sequel to "Every Single Minute", the boy finds himself lost in his sleep state.
tagline: Where is the rainbow?

title: Politic and spiritual
overview: An artist reflects about the daily life, how the frustration works and the expectatives about the future artists
tagline: Thoughts about being an artist pos 2000's

title: Over Our Ashes
overview: Igor thinks he's been cheated by his boyfriend. After discovering the truth, he begins to have a deep desire for revenge.
tagline: Igor wants the truth. But he doesn't want this truth.

title: The Man Who Defused Bombs
overview: A short film made for Venezia 70 - Future Reloaded (2013).

title: Sweet Water
overview: João and Pedro are cousins who met each other after many years to deal with inheritance matters: their grandfather's farm, which is about to be sold to a sugar mill. Mother nature's forces shed light on unsolved business between them.

title: P.I.M.P. BANK
overview: All Diogo ever wanted was an internship at a big Investment Bank. What was suppose to be just an interview, will soon become a savage fight for survival.

original_title: Fim de Semana no Paraíso Selvagem
title: Fim de Semana no Paraíso Selvagem

original_title: Manual do Amor para Jovens Desastrados
title: Manual do Amor para Jovens Desastrados

original_title: Vamos Ter a Noite Seguinte, Em Vez da Manhã Anterior
title: The Night After (Instead Of The Morning Before)
overview: In a ghost town of Salvador da Bahia and in an undefined period of time, Cleo sees herself pierced by two antagonic feelings: the loneliness of the physical and political ruins from an once free place, and the hope she keeps in the last relationship that remains in her life - a childhood friend, perhaps an old and latent flame.
tagline: A tropical neo-noir romance

original_title: Morreram as Vacas e Ficaram os Bois
title: Morreram as Vacas e Ficaram os Bois
Solo
overview: Silvia is a ballerina completely consumed with dance. She locks herself in her apartment, determined to rehearse until she achieves perfection. Her compulsion makes her enter a state of growing delirium, to the point of not sleeping and hardly eating. Her rehearsals are only interrupted when she notices a dirt stain on the carpet. Silvia tries to clean it in vain. Tormented, she tears off the carpet trying to discover the origin of the stain but the stain relentlessly continues to grow and invades the apartment little by little.

title: Night in Motion
overview: High speed in the big city

title: PostMortem "Maria Auxiliadora Lara Barcelos"
overview: Maria Auxiliadora Lara Barcelos was a Colina militant at the time of the Military Regime in Brazil, until she was kidnapped and tortured.

title: Dobrada á moda do Porto
overview: A man orders a specific food at a restaurant and the order came wrong

title: Mirror
overview: Monica lives or pretends to live a life she hates. Used to being alone, she fails to realize that she is just a mirror in a world of lost people.

title: Estranhos Numa Noite
overview: A stranger arrives back at his residence, which contains a secret.

title: Annunciation
overview: Maria eagerly awaits a meeting.

title: Litoral
overview: One winter night, the sea once again threatens the flat tower where Teresa lives. The next day, her daughter comes to pressure her to leave everything behind.

title: A Strange Path
overview: As a virus spreads throughout Brazil, a young filmmaker goes back to his village and tries to rekindle his relationship with his father. But as they become closer, stranger events start to happen, making their connection more difficult.

title: O Abajour
overview: Guilherme lives in a rich neighborhood in Rio de Janeiro and his girlfriend is the daughter of a respected lawyer. Behind his upper-class habits, he cooperates with corrupt policemen providing information to them. Things change when he finds out that a close friend has problems with a dangerous gangster.

title: Selo
overview: A mysterious letter is sought and passed from character to character.

original_title: O Funeral de Expectativas e Memórias de um Gato
title: The Memories in a Funeral of a Cat
overview: A love between two humans who loves cats find peace in the animal's world.
tagline: Cats: they have thoughts and feelings...

title: Chove
overview: Exibided at Cinemateca do MAM

title: Vortex
overview: After another night at work, Paulo can't park his car and drive home.

title: Bittersweet Rain
overview: As if adolescence is not hard enough, a young, fatherless teenager living in a small town in the Brazilian heartland, confronts a degenerative eye disease that will ultimately leave him blind. As his vision deteriorates, he goes through the pain and confusion of his unreciprocated first love, and ultimately will have to learn first-hand how to see life with different eyes.

original_title: Eu sei que vou te amar
title: Eu sei que vou te amar
Neither Girl Nor Woman
overview: In 1987, Federico (Felipe Vieira), who works for an Italian mafia, questions a decision made in a recent past, remembering moments together with his wife Giovanna (Marcela Cipriani). All this when going to another service, buy a Ford Model-A year 1929 with his partner Marcello (Fábio Vergani). What Federico still hasn't figured out is whether the choice he made was right or wrong, and whether those two options are still available.
tagline: Even being gangsters as they were, they never stopped being men.

original_title: Eu, Eu Mesma e S(Eu) Afeto
title: Eu, Eu Mesma e S(Eu) Afeto
Cactus/es lost in the streets
overview: When a northeastern brazilian worker, Filismino, is forced to move to the big southeastern metropolis of São Paulo, the northeastern grim reaper is forced to go there and kill him.

title: Shorts Steps
overview: An ant reflects about world and life.

title: Coisa Pública
overview: In a student republic, seven young people share their lives in an apparently common way. A party, however, brings an event that will take down any social mask and throw the republic into its hidden rot.

original_title: Venha Ver o Pôr do Sol
title: Venha Ver o Pôr do Sol

original_title: Eu Ainda Sinto Falta de Muita Coisa
title: Eu Ainda Sinto Falta de Muita Coisa
overview: Mountainous images accompanied by the song "Suzanne" by Leonard Cohen.

title: (In)Sight
overview: When Carlos (a peculiar yet successful writer) starts watching the young couple next door from his window - seeking inspiration for his next book - he begins to witness increasingly odd events.

title: Ararat
overview: On the eve of the centenary of the Armenian Genocide, two brothers who own a traditional Armenian bakery in São Paulo have a clash when they discover that the supervisor of the event may be a Turkish representative.
tagline: THAT STORY IS FAR FROM OVER

original_title: As Flores Me Sussurram Que Você Está Apaixonada
title: As Flores Me Sussurram Que Você Está Apaixonada
Ruptura
overview: Sara is a teenager who lives with the feeling of not belonging. At a party, she gets closer to Pedro, who shares her feeling of inadequacy.
tagline: A storm doesn't always warn of its arrival

title: Rebel addiction
overview: A young graffiti artist faces past traumas in one last action.
tagline: Rebel addiction

title: The Modern Hero
overview: Marc manages his work time with his wife and son throughout the week, but, even facing tiredness and boss charges, he still enjoys time with his family and even cook dinner.
tagline: short

title: O Colecionador de Sacis
overview: Mário Sbardelotto is a middle-aged man who lives alone with a collection of bottles. Each of them, he guarantees, contains a different saci. When the oldest of them falls and breaks, Mário is sure that the little devil is loose in the house and will do everything to capture him again – including asking Negrinho do Pastoreio for help.

original_title: Cipriano e a Morte de Cipriano
title: Cipriano e a Morte de Cipriano
When Time Stood Still
overview: "When Time Stood Still" tells the story of the magical encounter of a young couple, where within themselves, both of them will have to face the stereotypes that society constantly imposes on their personal decisions, their insecurities and ultimately find the courage necessary to free themselves and experience the beauty of love.

title: Vértices
overview: Peoples' lives intertwine at a private club.

title: Seco Estudo de Cavalos
overview: In this videoart, the creator uses mixed media animation as they read a Clarice Lispector short story. Drawing a comparison with her own life experiences, she questions what it means to be a lesbian. Excluded from every aspect of the patriarchal life, she creates her own identity through her loved ones, relying on the precursors of the lesbofeminist movement.
tagline: PUNK. HORSES. LESBOFEMINISM.

original_title: Erros Meus, Má Fortuna, Amor Ardente
title: Erros Meus, Má Fortuna, Amor Ardente
overview: Erros Meus, Má Fortuna, Amor Ardente brings us a story from a small, rural village in the interior of Portugal where, by reason of a funeral, people from all parts of the region are arriving. Maria is a young woman from that village, unsatisfied with her marriage with João, who has never given her a child: her biggest desire. By cause of the funeral, Carlos arrives, and his arrival and Maria's emancipated behavior generate distrust from the other villagers. Maria, a serious, beautiful and virtuous woman, loved by every man in the village and hated by all the women, awakes in João the weakness of jealousy, and in Carlos the weakness of an old love.

title: Love in Anomaly
overview: Two people are having a romantic picnic when a space-time error starts looping the time. Carolina needs to find a way to escape and maybe the answer isn't what André wants to hear.
tagline: Achievement Unlocked: You came out of the closet

title: Waste of Time?
overview: After another monotonous, tiring and repetitive day of class, two students from a school on their way home, start a conversation at the bus stop to reflect on whether what they do at school and in their everyday life is really useful, and how long will daily repetitiveness be present in our lives and will everything we do generate results in the future or is everything we go through just a waste of time.
tagline: Was this also a waste of time?

title: IMPETUS
overview: In a riverside community, a father and son struggle to stay on their land.
tagline: Á Ferro e Fogo.

title: O Homem-Grilo
overview: A man enters a symbiotic relationship with an entity that asks terrible things of him.
tagline: Cri Cri

title: Woman
overview: We accompany different women, in their most diverse moments, while they, in their own way, summarize what BEING A WOMAN really IS.

title: Universe
overview: "Do you think we will be able to be apart from each other?"

title: HUE
overview: The movie follows the story of four teens on a underground party full of sex and drugs where things go terribly wrong.

title: Sala de Jantar
overview: During a commemorative meeting, Sofia, the only daughter, finds herself clashing with the behavior of her conservative family members and realizes all the hypocrisy that hides behind a family lunch.

title: Dorso
overview: At his boyfriend's birthday party, Dorso begins to notice signs that he is being cheated on.

title: Musa Pagã
overview: A photojournalist from Belém records murder scenes daily. He lives with Doralice, in a symbiotic relationship where they try to meet his emotional, psychological and physical needs.

title: Lascívia
overview: The short tells the daily life of a couple who flirt through videos sent by her, always catching them off guard.

title: Combustão Espontânea
overview: Three stories of people trapped to their routines repressing a deep desire to free themselves from these realities, even if in peculiar ways.

production_companies.name: National Taiwan University of the Arts (TW)
Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School

title: 50 Mouse Steps
overview: Ognyan and Vera meet again after 10 years of separation. What unites them is a "time capsule" buried by them when they were children. Childhood memories lead them to the beginning of a one-day adventure that may be their last.

production_companies.name: Krastyo Sarafov National Academy for Film and Theatre Arts

title: Cure #1
overview: A study of women in the modern world, a regeneration of what it means to "be a woman", what it means to be the source of life, what it means to be this magical element that generates other beings and changes mood according to the position of the moon.

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

original_title: Entre o Céu e a Terra
title: Entre o Céu e a Terra

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

original_title: Os Peixes Mais Lindos do Mundo
title: The Most Beautiful Fishes in The World
overview: Catarina is a young woman from the Baixada Fluminense who struggles to adapt to the changes in her life and in the Brazilian political scene. Still mourning the death of her mother and hopeless about her future prospects, she sees her adult life taking shape abruptly. While trying to learn how to grow up and how to deal with all this pressure, Catarina ends up developing a strange obsession with fishes.
tagline: Everything changes all the time when you are a teenager

title: Segunda Camada
overview: When an unforeseen event happens to the owner of an Airbnb in the interior of São Paulo, a mysterious guest is forced to share the place with him, making them have a contrasting and curious coexistence.
tagline: The Death, deaf, walks beside me

title: Sofia Foi
overview: The solitary nocturnal drift of Sofia, 23, around the campus of the University of Sao Paulo, after she had to leave the flat where she was staying.

original_title: O que as almas têm a dizer
title: What the souls have to say
overview: A history about death, life and suffering. If souls could talk, what would they say?
tagline: Life, death: Soul

original_title: Contos Analógicos do Centro da Cidade
title: Contos Analógicos do Centro da Cidade
Days I Didn't Forget
overview: The story of a men and his memories around his new apartament.
tagline: Don't go, I need you

title: Margaridas
overview: Videoart inspired by Daisies (1966) by Věra Chytilová. This short film explores teenagehood feelings as a woman by mixing psychedelic elements and instrumental music.
tagline: Freedom is not enough. What I desire has no name yet.

title: Dissonante
overview: Short film produced in film school that approaches depersonalization disorder by mixing some aspects of video art and video performance.
tagline: Are you in touch with your body?

title: Not Yet
overview: A few days before her birthday, Marina receives a visit from her mother. Will she be able to talk to her and tell her what's going on?

title: Pacific
overview: The unfolding of daily life, a week after the incident.
tagline: Pacific

title: Shrooms
overview: Follows Dan, a young Venezuelan man currently living in Lisbon, who collects magic mushrooms in the forest and distributes them in the city to those in need of help - like a New Age Robin Hood - using pigeons as carriers.

title: O último Andar
overview: In a very claustrophobic environment, this horror movie tells the story of Alma: a shy girl who gets stuck with Eduardo inside an elevator.

title: Before One More Day
overview: One family suffers from the death of their mother and wife. Amid the suffering, each one seeks a way to deal with the loss and Mariana, the eldest daughter, tries to pick up the remaining pieces of her family.
The world is huge, you have to be ready... 16.10.12 is a drama that addresses the dilemma of a father facing the  inevitability of death.

original_title: Do Tanto de Telha no Mundo
title: Do Tanto de Telha no Mundo
overview: Leo goes to Juatama to pay an unexpected visit to his mother, Cleide, whom he hasn't seen for a long time. During their stay, both will have to deal with old conflicts that led to the separation from this relationship. Even without knowing how his mother will react, Leo gathers the courage to reveal his real intention in visiting her: to say goodbye.

title: Todavia Sinto
overview: Feel, Discover and Decide: Sensations of a pregnancy.  An immersed body that now transforms.

production_companies.name: Escola Internacional de Cine e TV de San Antonio de los Banos - Cuba

title: Paronomásia
overview: After an aspiring writer moves into a new house with her boyfriend she finds herself unhappy. Through writing, she travels to the past in the body of an unknown woman, finding many similarities and conflicts between the past and the present.

title: Departure
overview: A father and a son attempt to reconnect through their mutual passion.
tagline: THE DREAM OF A GENERATION

title: Ser Ilhéu
overview: A short film that captures the loneliness of old age in a consistent, close and courageous manner. It shows us the daily life of a woman lost in time and abandoned in her fajã.

title: Abyssal Fish
overview: ABYSSAL FISH is a creative film in the border between fiction, real and performance through the artistic work of Luís Capucho. A singular artist who survived the time when the HIV represented the death stigma. Building an amazing work of poetic power post­disease, Capucho surpasses the physical sequels that have left him mute and without part of his body movements for a while, until the current partial recovery.

title: Mend
overview: Zé runs a repair shop where he toils over the dregs and discards of his suburban seaside town. Zé is a black bisexual middle-aged man looking for love, and facing down the invisible traumas of colonialism to find a new kind of freedom. But can he learn to mend his relationship with himself?

title: Eternal Memories
overview: Miguel is being haunted by something he doesn't understand. In one of his sleepless nights, an angel named Mihael reveals himself to him.
tagline: A love that lasts forever

title: The Reservoir
overview: Lucas is a quiet, ruggedly handsome, stoical man on a mission. As he crosses the country to locate an obscure forgotten plot of family land from his late mother’s will, Lucas encounters strange places, eccentric new friends, random dreamlike circumstances, plus a long lost brother and a surprise romantic/erotic situation with a young motorcyclist.

title: Laio
overview: While out with his friends for fun one night in São Paulo, Leandro is confronted with glimpses of his own violence. The film is loosely inspired by the homophobic attack that occurred in the Paulista Avenue area, in which teenagers used fluorescent lamps as a weapon.

title: Sweet Dreams
overview: In a online therapy session, Angela tells stories about her relationship with Fred.
tagline: There is no such thing as an angelical love.

title: After Party
overview: Sofia and Victória meet again at a party after not seeing each other for years. After the party is over, Sofia stays to help Victória clean up.

title: 3 scenes
overview: A compilation of words, images and poetry.
tagline: 3 scenes

title: São Bernoia
overview: São Bernardo do Campo, late 1970s. A man recalls his youth in the context of workers' strikes, the beginning of skateboarding in Brazil and the peak of rock n' roll, when his group of friends decide to film an afternoon in their life, in Super -8.

title: Amizade Inesperada
overview: Luiz is a high school student who, by neglecting his studies, gets a failing grade. To help him, the teacher gives Toni the mission to teach the student the unlearned material. However, Luiz has a history of school violence against Toni. Putting aside the past the two accept the challenge given by the teacher and end up living an unpretentious romance.

title: Submissive Omission
overview: A couple interrupts an intimate moment to discuss their relationship.

title: Fish Head
overview: Marcela disappeared without leaving a trace. Those who were left to deal with her absence try to figure out who and what Marcela really was and the reasons behind her disappearance.

title: Another's Freedom
overview: A housewife with the dream of becoming a writer is unhappy in her marriage and finds love in the arms of another woman.
tagline: What if you could write your own destiny?

original_title: Já Não Sou Eu Quem Vive
title: Já Não Sou Eu Quem Vive
Farewell, Calon
overview: In a Roma people camp in Belo Horizonte’s metropolitan region, Mrs. Morena reads passers-by’s hands to earn a living, and Mr. Nonô sings to spend time. Among the daily chores, it comes to the day when Morena needs to face the saddest Roma ritual.

title: Red Bodies
overview: The short film portrays the story of Marcos Vinicius in his four stages of life: childhood, adolescence, youth and adulthood, and all the difficulties he has been through for being black and from the suburbs.
tagline: What if?

title: That Dark Day
overview: Fábio, a young trans man, is a caregiver for the elderly. Louise, mature cis woman, is very sick. Amidst a polarized and intolerant society, they have each other to rely on and learn to say their goodbyes. He, to a relationship ended abruptly. She, away from her family, to her own life.

title: Autoerótico
overview: On a foggy night, a blonde woman unexpectedly haunts the path of two young men in a suburban park.

title: PURPLE
overview: “ROXO” is the unreachable past of a couple composed of Red and Blue. One of them persists in lighting a gasless flame, while the other moves towards an imminent separation.

title: Flor do Ártico
overview: Laura and Clarice live very different realities. While Laura tries to decide her life and take courage about her future, Clarice deals with her past tormented by an abusive relationship. Their lives intertwine as Laura's curiosity speaks louder, she takes her first dose of courage, and a passion arises with both facing their previous baggage and future plans along the way.
